S04bsu034_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena bhikṣuniyutaśatasahasreṇa aśītyā ca bodhisattvaniyutaiḥ sārdham /
S04bsu034_u:2_1: sarvairakajātipratibaddhairabhijñābhijñātairdaśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitairdhāraṇīsūtrāntagatiṃ gataiḥ sarvasattvadharmadānasaṃtoṣakairmahābhijñājñānodāhārakuśalaiḥ sarvapāramitāparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ sarvabodhisattvasamādhisamāpattivyavasthānajñānakuśalaiḥ sarvabuddhastutastobhitapraśastaiḥ sarvabuddhakṣetravyākramaṇakuśalaiḥ sarvamārasaṃtrāsanajñānakuśalaiḥ sarvadharmayathāvajjñānakuśalaiḥ sarvasattvendriyaparāparajñānakuśalaiḥ buddhasarvakarmapūjāsamādānaprajñānakuśalaiḥ sarvalokadharmānupaliptaiḥ kāyavākcittasamalaṃkṛtaiḥ mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaiḥ mahāvīryāsaṃkhyeyakalpāparikṣīṇamānasaiḥ mahāsiṃhanādanādibhiḥ sarvaparapravādānabhibhūtaiḥ avaivartikamudrāmudritaiḥ sarvabuddhadharmābhiṣekaprāptaiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2_2: tadyathā - meruṇā ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu034_u:2_3: sumeruṇā ca / mahāmeruṇā ca / meruśikhariṃdhareṇa ca / merupradīparājena ca / merukūṭena ca / merudhvajena ca / merugajena ca / meruśikhare saṃghaṭṭanarājena ca /
S04bsu034_u:2_4: merusvareṇa ca / megharājena ca / dundubhisvareṇa ca / ratnapāṇinā ca / ratnākareṇa ca / ratnaketunā ca / ratnaśikhareṇa ca / ratnasaṃbhavena ca ratnaprabhāsena ca /
S04bsu034_u:2_5: ratnayaṣṭinā ca / ratnamudrāhastena ca / ratnavyūhena ca / ratnajālinā ca / ratnaprabheṇa ca / ratnadvīpeṇa ca / ratiṃkareṇa ca / dharmavyūhena ca / vyūharājena ca / lakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtena ca / svaravyūhena ca / svaraviśuddhiprabheṇa ca / ratnakūṭena ca / ratnacūḍena ca / daśaśataraśmikṛtārciṣā jyoti rasena ca /
S04bsu034_u:2_14: maheśākhyamaheśākhyairudārodārairdevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyairbhagavān [Vaidya_2] satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rcito 'pacāyitaścatasṛṇāmapi parṣadāṃ sadevalokasya lokasya vandanīyaḥ pūjanīyo namaskaraṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2_15: tatra khalu bhagavānanekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu034_u:2_16: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:3_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte candraprabho nāma kumārabhūtaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlo jātismaro labdhapratibhāno mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahākaruṇābhiyuktaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3_1: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśam,
S04bsu034_u:3_3: evamukte bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - pṛccha tvaṃ kumārabhūta tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadeva kāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu034_u:3_4: ahaṃ tasya tasyaiva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu034_u:3_6: nāsti kumāra tathāgatasya sarvadharmeṣvajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā anantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu /
S04bsu034_u:3_7: nityakṛtaste kumāra avakāśo bhavatu tathāgataṃ praśnaparipṛcchanāya /
S04bsu034_u:3_8: ahaṃ te tasya tasyaiva praśnasya pṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu034_u:4_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūtastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.2_0: kathaṃ carantu narendra satyavādi naravṛṣabha naradevapūjanīya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.2_1: atuliyu varu labdhamagrayāṇaṃ giravara pṛṣṭa viyākuruṣva nātha //
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.3_0: adhyāśayena pṛcchāmi śāṭhyaṃ mama na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.3_1: sākṣī na kaścidanyo me anyatra puruṣottamāt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.4_0: vipula praṇidhi mahyamasti chandaścariya prajānasi mahya śākyasiṃha /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.4_1: na ca ahaṃ vacanavittako bhaviṣye laghu pratipatti bhaṇāhi me narendra //
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.6_0: upakare dharma mama brūhi nātha yatha naru niṣevatu bhoti tīkṣṇaprajñaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.6_1: apagatabhayabhairavo atrasto na ca parityāgu karoti śīlaskandhāt /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.7_0: kathaṃ na tyajate śīlaṃ kathaṃ dhyānaṃ na riñcati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.8_0: kathaṃ daśabalaśāsane udāre abhirati vindati śīla rakṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.8_1: kathaṃ bhavati acchidru śīlaskandhaḥ kathaṃ ca tuleti svabhāvu saṃskṛtasya //
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.9_0: kathaṃ kāyena vācā pariśuddho bhoti paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.10_0: kathaṃ bhavati viśuddhakāyakarmā kathaṃ ca vivarjita bhonti vācadoṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.10_1: kathaṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ puruṣavara mama pṛṣṭa vyākuruṣva //
S04bsu034_u:5_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - ekadharmeṇa kumāra samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva etān guṇān pratilabhate,
S04bsu034_u:5_2: katamenaikadharmeṇa? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto bhavati hitacitto 'pratihatacitto 'viṣamacittaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:5_3: anena kumāra ekadharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva etān guṇān pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S04bsu034_u:6_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata - [Vaidya_4]
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.11_1: etān guṇān sa labhate kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ ca budhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.12_0: na ca kaści pratihanyate 'sya cittam apratihatacittu yo bhoti bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.12_1: na ca khilu janayati na pradoṣaṃ labhati yathā parikīrtitān viśeṣān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.13_0: samaṃ cittaṃ niṣevitvā vipāko darśitaḥ samaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.15_0: daśadiśita viroci bodhisattvaḥ sphurati śirīya prabhāya buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu034_u:srs_1.15_1: yada bhavati sa labdhu śāntabhūmi tada bahusattva sthapeti buddhajñāne //
S04bsu034_u:7_0: tatra kumāra sarvasattveṣu samacitto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo hitacitto 'pratihatacitto 'viṣamacittaṃ imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:7_1: katamaśca sa kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ nāma samādhiḥ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:7_2: katamaśca sa kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiḥ? yaduta kāyasaṃvaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:7_3: vāksaṃvaraḥ / manaḥsaṃvaraḥ / karmapariśuddhiḥ / ālambanasamatikramaḥ / skandhaparijñā / dhātusamatā / āyatanāpakarṣaḥ / tṛṣṇāprahāṇam / anutpādasākṣātkriyāvatāraḥ / hetudīpanā / karmaphalāvipraṇāśaḥ / dharmadarśanam / mārgabhāvanā / tathāgatasamavadhānam / tīkṣṇaprajñatā / satyānupraveśaḥ / dharmajñānam / pratisaṃvidavatārajñānam / akṣarapadaprabhedajñānam / vastūnāṃ samatikramaḥ / ghoṣaparijñā / prāmodyapratilābhaḥ / dharmaprītyanubhavanatā / ārjavatā / mārdavatā / ṛjukatā / akuṭilatā vigatabhṛkuṭitā / suratatā / suśīlatā / sākhilyam / mādhuryam / smitamukhatā / pūrvābhilāpitā / ehīti svāgatavāditā / anālasyam / gurugauravatā / guruśuśrūṣā / upapattisaṃtuṣṭiḥ / śukladharmātṛptatā / ājīvaviśuddhiḥ / araṇyavāsānutsargaḥ / bhūmivyavasthānajñānam / smṛteravipraṇāśaḥ / skandhakauśalyam / dhātukauśalyam / āyatanakauśalyam / abhijñāsākṣātkriyāvatāraḥ / kleśāpakarṣaṇam / vāsanānusaṃghisamuddhātaḥ / jñānaviśeṣagāmitā / bhāvanāniṣyandaḥ / āpattivyutthānakauśalyam / paryutthānaviṣkambhaṇam / anuśayaprahāṇam / [Vaidya_5] bhavasamatikramaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:7_4: jātismaratā / niṣkāṅkṣatā / karmavipāke dharmacittatā / śrutaparyeṣṭijñānatīkṣṇatā / jñānatṛṣṇā / jñānānubodhaḥ / ājāneyabhūmiḥ / śailopamacittatā / akampyatā / acalatā / avinivartanīyabhūmivyavasthānajñānam /
S04bsu034_u:7_5: kuśaladharmaniṣyandaḥ / pāpadharmajugupsanatā / asamudācāratā kleśānām / śikṣāyā aparityāgaḥ / samādhivyavasthānam / āśayajñānam / sattveṣūpapattiviśeṣajñānam /
S04bsu034_u:7_6: / gatisamatā / dharmapravicayakauśalyam / pravrajyācittam / dharmaviniścayakauśalyam / dharmapadaprabhedajñānam / dharmapadābhinirhārakauśalyam /
S04bsu034_u:7_8: pūrvāntajñānam / aparāntajñānam / pratyutpannajñānam / tryadhvasamatājñānam / trimaṇḍalapariśuddhijñānam / kāyāvasthānajñānam / cittāvasthānajñānam / īryāpatharakṣaṇam / īryāpathavikopanam / īryāpathavikalpanam / īryāpathaprāsādikatā / arthānarthakauśalyajñānam / yuktabhāṇitā / lokajñatā / muktatyāgitā / pratatapāṇitā / anavagṛhītacittatā / hrīvyapatrapitā / akuśalacittajugupsanatā / dhūtaguṇānutsargaḥ / cāritrasamādānam / priyasamudācāratā / gurūṇāṃ pratyutthānāsanapradānatā /
S04bsu034_u:7_9: mānanigrahaḥ / cittasaṃpragrahaḥ / cittasamutpādajñānam / arthaprativedhajñānam / jñānaprativedhajñānam / jñānānubodhaḥ / ajñānavigamaḥ / cittapraveśajñānam / cittasvabhāvānubodhajñānam / āhāranirhārakauśalyajñānam / sarvarutajñānam / niruktivyavasthānajñānam / arthaviniścayajñānam / anarthavivarjanam / satpuruṣasamavadhānam / satpuruṣasaṃsevanatā / kāpuruṣavivarjanam / dhyānānāṃ niṣpādanam, tatra cānāsvādanam / abhijñāvikurvaṇam / nāmasaṃketaprajñaptisvabhāvāvatārajñānam /
S04bsu034_u:7_10: prajñaptisamuddhātaḥ / saṃskāreṣu nirvedaḥ / satkāreṣvanabhilāṣaḥ / asatkāreṣūpekṣā / lābhe 'narthikatā / alābhe 'navalīnatā / yaśasyanabhilāṣaḥ / ayaśasyapratighaḥ / praśaṃsāyāmanunayaḥ / nindāyāmaviṣādaḥ / sukhe 'nabhiṣvaṅgaḥ / duḥkhe 'vaimukhyam / saṃskārāṇāmanādānatā / bhūtavarṇe 'saṅgaḥ / abhūtavarṇe 'dhivāsanatā / gṛhasthapravrajitairasaṃstavaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:7_11: agocaravivarjanam / gocarapracāraḥ / ācārasaṃpat / anācāravivarjanatā / kulānāmadūṣaṇatā / śāsanasyārakṣaṇatā / alpabhāṣaṇatā / mitabhāṣaṇatā / prativacanakauśalyam / pratyarthikanigrahaḥ / kālapratikramaṇatā / akālavivarjanatā / pṛthagjaneṣvaviśvāsaḥ / duḥkhitānāmaparibhavanatā, tebhyaśca dhanapradānam / daridrāṇāmanavasādanatā / duḥśīleṣvanukampā / hitavastutā / kṛpābuddhitā / dharmeṇānugrahaḥ / āmiṣaparityāgaḥ / asaṃcayasthāpitā / [Vaidya_6] śīlapraśaṃsanatā /
S04bsu034_u:7_12: / yathoktakāritā / abhīkṣṇaprayogitā / satkṛtya prītyanubhavanatā / dṛṣṭāntajñānam / pūrvayogakauśalyam / kuśalamūlapūrvaṃgamatā / upāyakauśalyam / nimittaprahāṇam / saṃjñāvivartaḥ / vastūnāṃ parijñā / sūtrāntābhinirhāraḥ / vinayakauśalyam / satyaviniścayaḥ / vimuktisākṣātkriyāvatāraḥ / ekāṃśavacanapravyāhāratā / yathāvajjñānadarśanānutsarjanam /
S04bsu034_u:7_14: vaiśāradyapratilambhaḥ / jñānenāvabhāsaḥ / śīladṛḍhatā / samāpattyavatāraḥ / prajñāpratilambhaḥ / ekārāmatā / ātmajñatā / alpajñānatā / saṃtuḥṭiḥ / cittasyānāvilatā / dṛḥṭikṛtavivarjanatā / dhāraṇīpratilambhaḥ / jñānāvatāraḥ / sthānāsthānaprasthānapratipattijñānam /
S04bsu034_u:7_15: hetuyuktinayadvāram / kāraṇam / mārgaḥ / pratipattiḥ / saṃdeśaḥ / avavādaḥ / anuśāsanī / caryā / ānulomikī kḥāntiḥ / kḥāntibhūmiḥ / akḥāntivigamaḥ / jñānabhūmiḥ / ajñānaprahāṇam / jñānapratiḥṭhānam / yogācārabhūmiḥ / bodhisattvagocaraḥ / satpuruḥasevanā / asatpuruḥavivarjanā / sarvadharmasvabhāvānubodhaprativedhajñānam /
S04bsu034_u:7_17: paṇḍitairanumoditā / bālaiḥ pratikḥiptā / durvijñeyā śrāvakaiḥ / ājñātā pratyekabuddhaiḥ / abhūmistīrthikānām / bodhisattvaiḥ / parigṛhītā / daśabalairanubaddhā / devaiḥ pūjanīyā / brahmaṇā vandanīyā / śakrairadhigamanīyā / nāgairnamaskaraṇīyā / yakḥairanumodanīyā / kinnaraiḥ stotavyā / mahoragaiḥ praśaṃsanīyā / bodhisattvairbhāvanīyā / paṇḍitaiḥ paryavāptavyā / dhanamanuttaram / dānaṃ nirāmiḥam / bhaiḥajyaṃ glānānām / moditā śāntacittānām / kośo jñānasya / akḥayaḥ pratibhānasya / nayaḥ sūtrāntānām / vigamaḥ kośasya / viḥayaḥ śūrāṇām / parijñā traidhātukasya / kolaḥ pāragāminām / nauroghamadhyagatānām / kīrtiryaśaskāmānām / varṇo buddhānām / praśaṃsā tathāgatānām / stavo daśabalānām / guṇo bodhisattvānām / upekḥā kāruṇikānām / maitrī doḥaṃ śamayitukāmānām /
S04bsu034_u:7_18: muditā praśāntacāriṇām / āśvāso mahāyānikānām / pratipattiḥ siṃhanādanādinām /
S04bsu034_u:7_20: vitrāsanaṃ mārasenāyāḥ / vidyā kḥemagāminām / arthaḥ siddhārthānām / paritrāṇamamitramadhyagatānām /
S04bsu034_u:7_22: satyākaro vaiśāradyānām / bhūte paryeḥṭirbālānām / pūrvanimittamaḥṭādaśānāmāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:7_23: alaṃkāro dharmakāyasya / niḥyandaścaryāyāḥ / ābharaṇaṃ buddhaputrāṇām / ratirmokḥakāmānām / prītirjyeḥṭhaputrāṇām / paripūrirbuddhajñānasya / abhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām /
S04bsu034_u:7_25: asaṃkleśo buddhajñānasya / anāgamo rāgasya [Vaidya_7] / vigamo dveḥasya / abhūmirmohasya / āgamo jñānasya / utpādo vidyāyāḥ / prahāṇamavidyāyāḥ / tṛptirvimuktisārāṇām / tuḥṭiḥ samādhisārāṇām / cakḥurdraḥṭukāmānām / abhijñā vikurvitukāmānām / ṛddhirabhinirhartukāmānām / dhāraṇī śrutārthikānām / smṛterasaṃpramoḥaḥ / adhiḥṭhānaṃ buddhānām / upāyakauśalyaṃ nāyakānām / sūkḥmaṃ durvijñeyamanabhiyuktānām /
S04bsu034_u:7_27: ājñātaṃ vijñaiḥ / jñātaṃ sūrataiḥ / pratividdhamalpecchaiḥ / udgṛhītamārabdhavīryaiḥ / dhṛtaṃ smṛtimadbhiḥ / kḥayo duḥkhasya / anutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇām / ekanayanirdeśaḥ sarvabhavagatyupapattyāyatanānām /
S04bsu034_u:7_28: ayaṃ sa kumāra ucyate sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:8_0: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvadharmaparyāye samādhinirdeśe bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe aśīternayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtāyā anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:8_4: ṣaṣṭeśca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
S04bsu034_u:8_8: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:8_21: sarvaśca lokadhātuḥ sadevakaśca samārakaḥ sabrahmakaḥ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāḥ prajāstenāvabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:8_22: imau ca candrasūryau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau evaṃmaheśākhyau na bhāsato na tapato na virocataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:8_25: ye 'pi tāsūpapannāḥ sattvāḥ, te 'pyanyonyaṃ saṃjānate sma /
S04bsu034_u:8_26: evaṃ cāhuḥ - anyo 'pi kila bho ayaṃ sattva ihopapannaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:14_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhiṃ kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ākāṅkṣati tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bhūtaṃ buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ saṃprakāśayituṃ no cārthato vā vyañjanato vā paryādānaṃ gantuṃ sarvaṃ ca me vacanaṃ buddhaparigṛhītaṃ niścaritumiti,
S04bsu034_u:14_1: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmarthāya ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyaḥ araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:14_2: katame ca te kumāra tathāgatasya bhūtā buddhaguṇāḥ? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā abhyavakāśagato vā śūnyāgāramadhyagato vā evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - evaṃ sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:14_4: avipraṇāśaḥ kuśalamūlānām / alaṃkṛtaḥ kṣāntyā / āgamaḥ puṇyanidhānānām / citrito 'nuvyañjanaiḥ / kusumito lakṣaṇaiḥ / pratirūpo gocareṇa / apratikūlo darśanena / abhiratiḥ śraddhādhimuktānām /
S04bsu034_u:14_5: anabhibhūtaḥ prajñayā / anavamardanīyo balaiḥ / śāstā sarvasattvānām / pitā bodhisattvānām / rājā āryapudgalānām / sārthavāha ādikarmikāṇām / aprameyo jñānena / anantaḥ pratibhānena / viśuddhaḥsvareṇa / āsvādanīyo ghoṣeṇa / asecanako rūpeṇa / apratisamaḥ kāyena / aliptaḥ kāmaiḥ / anupalipto rūpaiḥ / asaṃsṛṣṭa ārūpyaiḥ / vimukto duḥkhebhyaḥ / vipramuktaḥ skandhebhyaḥ / visaṃyukto dhātubhiḥ / saṃvṛta āyatanaiḥ / praticchanno granthaiḥ / vimuktaḥ paridāhaiḥ / parimuktastṛṣṇāyāḥ / oghāduttīrṇaḥ / paripūrṇo jñānena / pratiṣṭhito 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñāne /
S04bsu034_u:14_6: apratiṣṭhito nirvḥṇe / sthito bhūtakoṭyḥm / sthitaḥ sarvasattvollokanīyḥyḥṃ bhūmau /

S04bsu034_u:14_8: ebhirbuddhaguṇavarṇaiḥ samanvḥgato bodhisattvo mahḥsattva imaṃ samḥdhimḥgamya anḥcchedyena pratibhḥnena tathḥgatasyḥhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu034_u:14_9: bhūtaṃ buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ saṃprakḥśayan no cḥrthato no vyañjanataśca paryḥdḥnaṃ gacchati /

S04bsu034_u:21_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - samādhiḥ samādhiriti bhagavannucyate /

S04bsu034_u:26_0: tatra bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule 'prameye 'cintye 'parimāṇe yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:26_1: tena kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aśītiḥ śrāvakakoṭyaḥ prathamasannipāto 'bhūt sarveṣāmarhatām /

S04bsu034_u:26_5: ayaṃ ca jambudvīpa ṛddhaḥ sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ramaṇīyaśca bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyaścābhūt /

S04bsu034_u:26_10: / tena kālena tena samayena rājño mahābalasya vijite bhagavān ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpanno 'bhūt /

S04bsu034_u:26_12: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasaṃghasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya cotsado lābhasatkāraśloko 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:26_13: śrāddhāśca brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sabodhisattvasaṃghasya cotsadaṃ lābhasatkāramakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu034_u:26_14: te ca śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavato ghoṣadattasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya lābhasatkārāyodyuktā abhūvan lokāmiṣapūjāyai yaduta rājña eva ca mahābalasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpam /

S04bsu034_u:29_0: aśrauṣīt khalu punaḥ kumāra rājā mahābalo bhagavatā ghoṣadattena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ pravartitāṃ naiṣkramyapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathām /
S04bsu034_u:29_1: śrutvā ca vimṛśati - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S04bsu034_u:29_7: yannvahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyam /
S04bsu034_u:29_8: iti hi [Vaidya_26] kumāra rājā mahābalaḥ sārdhamaśītyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bhagavān ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu034_u:29_9: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt /
S04bsu034_u:29_10: atha khalu kumāra bhagavān ghoṣadatto rājño mahābalasya adhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ deśayate /
S04bsu034_u:29_11: atha khalu kumāra rājā mahābala imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ keśaśmaśraṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:29_13: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayiotvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /

S04bsu034_u:29_17: śrutvā tebhyo buddhebhyastenodgṛhītaḥ paryavāpto dhārito vācito bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /
S04bsu034_u:29_18: sa tataḥ paścāt tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśānāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena paripūrṇena kalpaśatasahasreṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'bhūt /

S04bsu034_u:29_20: tatra kumāra yānyaśītiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājñā mahābalena sārdhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ghoṣadattaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntāni,
S04bsu034_u:29_22: prītisaumanasyajātāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:29_23: te 'pi tathā pravrajitā imaṃ samādhimudgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagaman /
S04bsu034_u:29_25: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantike imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvodgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva pūrvakreṇa kuśalamūlena viṃśatīnāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena tataḥ paścāt paripūrṇadaśabhiḥ kalpasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā dṛḍhaśūranāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpannā abhuvan /
S04bsu034_u:29_26: te 'pyaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān paripācya teṣāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā buddhaparinirvṛtā abhūvan /

S04bsu034_u:srs_5.21_0: śruṇitva gāthāṃ tada rājapārthivo eko vicinteti rahogato nṛpaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.21_1: na śakya gehasmi sthihitva sarve pratipadyitumuttadharmapūjā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.22_0: sa rājya tyaktvā yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ prāṇisahasrebhiraśītibhiḥ saha /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.22_1: upasaṃkramī tasya jinasya antikaṃ vanditva pādau purataḥ sthito 'bhūt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.23_0: teṣāṃ jino āśayu jānamāno deśetimaṃ śānta samādhi durdṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.24_0: te pravrajitvāna imaṃ samādhiṃ dhāritva vācitva paryāpuṇitva /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.24_1: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ kalpāna koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatim //
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.25_0: te tena sarve kuśalena karmaṇā adrākṣu buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.25_1: sarveṣu co teṣu jinānuśāsane te pravrajitvemu samādhi bhāvayī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.26_0: te paścime kāli abhūṣi buddhā dṛḍhaśūranāmāna anantavīryāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.26_1: kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ te paścikālesmi śikhīva nirvṛtāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.27_0: mahābalo rājā ya āsi pūrvaṃ sa jñānaśūro abhu buddha loke /
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.27_1: tadā bahu prāṇisahasrakoṭiyaḥ sthapetva bodhāya sa paści nirvṛtaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_5.28_0: tasmācchruṇitvā imu paścikāle dhāreya sūtramimu buddhavarṇitam /
S04bsu034_u:33_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena samādhiparikarma karaṇīyam /
S04bsu034_u:33_1: tatra kumāra katamat samādhiparikarma? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahākaruṇāsaṃprasthitena cittena tiṣṭhatāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ vā pūjākarmaṇe udyukto bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:33_3: sa na kaṃciddharmamākāṅkṣaṃstathāgataṃ pūjayati na rūpaṃ na kāmān na bhogān na svargān na parivārān /
S04bsu034_u:33_7: tasmāttarhi kumāra eṣāṃ sā tathāgatānā pūjā yaduta tathāgatasyādarśanamātmanaścānupalabdhiḥ karmavipākasya cāpratikāṅkṣamāṇatā /
S04bsu034_u:33_8: anayā kumāra trimaṇḍalapariśuddhayā pūjayā tathāgataṃ pūjayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S04bsu034_u:34_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya etadeva samādhiparikarmanirdeśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśamati sma -
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.1_0: anantajñānasya daditva gandhān anantagandho bhavatī narāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.1_1: na kalpakoṭīya vrajanti durgatiṃ durgandhiyaṃ teṣu na jātu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.2_0: te kalpakoṭyaścaramāṇu cārikāṃ pūjitva buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.2_1: te jñānagandhena samudgatena bhavanti buddhā varaśīlagandhikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.3_0: sacet punarjānati vāsti sattvo yo gandha detī tatha yasya dīyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.3_1: etena cittena dadāti gandhameṣāsya kṣāntirmṛdu ānulomikī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.4_0: tasyaitaṃ kṣāntimadhimātra sevataḥ sacennaraḥ kākaṇicchedyu chidyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.4_1: kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikā na tasya cittaṃ bhavati vivartiyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.5_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ vucyati kṣānti nāma kathaṃ puno vucyati ānulomikī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.5_1: avivartiko vucyati kena hetunā kathaṃ puno vucyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.6_0: kṣāntyasmi dharme prakṛtau nirātmake nairātmyasaṃjñasya kileśu nāsti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.6_1: khaṃ yādṛśaṃ jānati sarvadharmāstasmādiha syā kva tu kṣānti nāma //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.7_0: ānulomi sarveṣa jināna śikṣato na cāsti dharmaścarate vicakṣaṇaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.7_1: na buddhadharmeṣu janeti saṃśayāniyaṃ sa kṣāntirbhavatānulomikī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.8_0: evaṃ carantasya ya loki mārāste buddharūpeṇa bhaṇeyya vācā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.8_1: sudurlabhā bodhi bhavāhi śrāvakā na gṛhṇotī vākyu na co vivartate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.9_0: bodheti sattvān viṣamātu dṛṣṭito na eṣa mārgo amṛtasya prāptaye /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.9_1: kumārga varṇitva pathe sthapeti taṃ kāraṇamucyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.10_1: svapnāntare 'pyasya na jātu bhoti asti naro pudgala jīva sattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.11_0: sace mārakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāste buddharūpeṇa upāgamitvā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.11_1: bhaṇeyurabhyantarakāyu jīvo te maṃ vade nāsti na yūya buddhā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.12_0: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyakaṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.12_1: vyāhāramātreṇa ca vyoharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.13_0: yathā hi putra puruṣasya jātu kṛtaṃsi nāmā ayameva nāma /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.13_1: nāmaṃ na tasyo diśatā sulabhyate tathāsya nāmaṃ na kutaścidāgatam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.14_0: tathaiva nāmaṃ kṛtu bodhisattvo na cāsya nāmaṃ diśatā sulabhyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.14_1: paryeṣamāṇo ayu bodhisattvo jānāti yo eṣa sa bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.15_0: samudramadhye 'pi jvaleta agni rna bodhisattvasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.15_1: yato 'sya bodhāya utpannu cittamatrāntare tasya na jīvadṛṣṭiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.16_0: na hyatra jāto na mṛto ca kaścidutpanna sattvo manujo naro vā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.16_1: māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyā na śakyate jānitu tīrthikehi //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.17_0: na cāpi āhāravimūrchitehi lubdhehi gṛddhehi ca pātracīvare /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.17_1: na coddhatehi napi connatehi śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabodhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.18_0: na styānamiddhābhihataiḥ kusīdaiḥ stabdhehi mānīhi anātrapehi /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.18_1: yeṣāṃ na buddhasmi prasādu asti na śakyate hī varabodhi jānitum //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.19_0: na bhinnavṛttehi pṛthagjanehi yeṣāṃ na dharmasmi prasādu asti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.19_1: sabrahmacārīṣu ca nāsti gauravaṃ na śakyate hī varabodhi buddhitum //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.20_0: abhinnavṛttā hirimanta lajjino yeṣāṃ sti buddhe api dharme prema /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.20_1: sabrahmacārīṣu ca tīvragauravaṃ te prāpuṇantī varabodhimuttamām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.21_0: smṛterupasthāna iha yeṣa gocaraḥ prāmodya prīti śayanamupastṛtam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.21_1: dhyānāni cāhāru samādhi pāniyaṃ budhyanti te 'pi varabodhimuttamām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.22_1: bodhyaṅgapuṣpā surabhī manoramā te yujyamānā varabodhi prāpayī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.23_0: yā bodhisattvāna carī vidūnāmabhūmiranyasya janasya tatra /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.23_1: pratyekabuddhāna ca śrāvakāṇa ca ko vātra vijño na janeya chandam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.24_0: sacenmamā āyu bhaveta ettakaṃ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.24_1: ekasya romasya bhaṇeya varṇaṃ bauddhena jñānena paryantu nāsti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_6.25_1: imaṃ samādhiṃ laghu uddiśeyā na durlabhā bheṣyati agrabodhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:37_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmātarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena trikṣāntijñānakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:37_3: tṛtīyā kṣāntiḥ prajñātavyā / trikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalena bhavitavyaṃ trikṣāntijñānaviśeṣakuśalena ca /
S04bsu034_u:37_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi kumāra yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvastrikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalo bhavati trikṣāntijñānaviśeṣakuśalaśca bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:37_5: tadāyaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,
S04bsu034_u:37_7: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmenāyaṃ trikṣāntyavatāro dharmaparyāya udgrahītavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:37_9: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti /
S04bsu034_u:38_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ trikṣāntyavatāraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.1_0: na kenacit sārdhaṃ karoti vigrahaṃ na bhāṣate vācamanarthasaṃhitām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.1_1: arthe ca dharme ca sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya sada nirdiśīyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.2_0: māyopamān jānati sarvadharmān na cāpi so bhoti nimittagocaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.2_1: na hīyate jñānavivṛddhabhūmeḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.3_1: anantajñānī sugatāna jñāne prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.4_0: yaḥ kaści dharmaṃ śṛṇute subhāṣitaṃ buddhāna co bhāṣita tanna kāṅkṣati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.4_1: adhimucyate sarvajināna dharmatāṃ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.5_1: yāsmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthatāṃ jānati sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.6_0: ye asmi loke pṛthu anyatīrthā na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.6_1: kāruṇyameteṣu upasthapeti prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.7_0: ābhāsamāgacchati tasya dhāraṇī tasmiṃśca ābhāsi na jātu kāṅkṣati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.7_1: satyānuparivartini vāca bhāṣate prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.8_1: na co vivarteta sa buddhabodheḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.9_0: ye śilpasthānā pṛthu asti loke sarveṣu so śikṣitu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.9_1: na cātmana uttari kiṃci paśyati prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.10_0: akampiyaḥ samathabalena bhoti śelopamo bhoti vipaśyanāya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.10_1: na kṣobhituṃ śakyu sa sarvasattvairdvitīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.11_1: samādhiye pāramitāgato vidu dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.12_0: samāhito labhati abhijña pañca kṣetraśataṃ gacchati dharmadeśakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.12_1: no cāpi so ṛddhibalāttu hīyate dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.13_0: sa tādṛśaṃ śānta samādhimeṣate samāhitasya na sa asti sattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.13_1: yastasya cittasya pramāṇu gṛhṇīyā dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.14_0: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste buddhajñānena bhaṇeyu dharmān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.14_1: udgṛhṇato sarva yato hi bhāṣiutaṃ dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.15_0: purimottarā dakṣiṇapaścimāsu heṣṭhe tathordhvaṃ vidiśāsu caiva /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.15_1: sarvatra so paśyati lokanāthān tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.16_1: deśeti dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.17_0: ya jambudvīpa iha buddhakṣetre sarvatra so dṛśyati bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.17_1: jñātaśca bhotī sasurāsure jage tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.18_0: buddhāna ācāru tathaiva gocarā īryāpatho yādṛśa nāyakānām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.18_1: sarvatra so śikṣitu bhoti paṇḍitastṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:39_0: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.19_0: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.19_2: sace 'sya tasmin nānunīyate mano na śikṣito ucyati buddhajñāne //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.20_0: ye lokadhātuiṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.20_1: sace 'sya teṣu pratihanyate mano na śikṣito 'dyāpi sa buddhajñāne //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.21_0: arthena labdhena na bhoti sūmano na cāpyanarthena sa bhoti durmanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.21_1: śailopame citti sadā pratiṣṭhito ayaṃ viśeṣastṛtīyāya kṣāntiyāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.22_1: śrutaṃmayā sā anutpattikā yā śikṣā ca atrāpyayu bodhimārgaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.23_0: tisro 'pi kṣāntīya sadā niruttarāḥ sa bodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.23_1: dṛṣṭvā tatastaṃ sugatā narottamā viyākaronti virajāya bodhaye //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.24_0: tato 'sya taṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śruṇitvā prakampitā medinī ṣaḍvikāram /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.24_1: ābhāya kṣetraṃ bhavate prabhāsvaraṃ puṣpāṇi ca varṣiṣu devakoṭyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.25_0: tasyo ca taṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śruṇitvā sattvāna koṭī niyutā acintiyā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.25_1: utpādayī citta varāgrabodhaye vayaṃ pi bheṣyāma jina āryacetikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.26_0: kṣāntyā imāstisra niruttarā yadā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.26_1: na cāpi so jāyati nāpi mrīyate na cāpi sa cyavati nopapadyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.27_0: yadā imā kṣānti trayo niruttarā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.27_1: na paśyateḥ jāyati yaśca mrīyate sthitadharmatāṃ paśyati sarvadharmān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.28_0: tathāhi teno vitatheti jñātā māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.28_1: na śūnyatā jāyati no ca mrīyate svabhāvaśūnyā imi sarvadharmāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.29_0: yadāttyasau satkṛtu bhoti kenacid upasthito mānitu pūjito 'rcitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.29_1: na tasya tasminnanunīyate mano jānāti so dharmasvabhāvaśūnyatām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.30_0: ākruṣṭa sattvehi prahāratarjito na teṣu krodhaṃ kurute na mānam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.30_1: maitrīṃ ca teṣu dṛḍha saṃjaneti tathaiva sattvāna pramocanāya //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.31_0: loṣṭehi daṇḍehi ca tāḍyamānaḥ pratighātu teṣu na karoti paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.31_1: nairātmyakṣāntīya pratiṣṭhitasya na vidyate krodhakhilaṃ na mānaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.32_0: tathāhi teno vitatheti jñātā māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.32_1: sa tādṛśe dharmanaye pratiṣṭhitaḥ susatkṛto bhoti sadevaloke //
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.33_0: yadāpi sattvāḥ pragṛhītaśastrāśchindeyu tasyo pṛthu aṅgamaṅgam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.33_1: na tasya teṣu pratihanyate mano na cāpi maitrī karuṇā tu hīyate //
S04bsu034_u:40_0: evaṃ ca so tatra janeti cittaṃ chindanti te hi pṛthu aṅgamaṅgam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.34_0: evaṃ ca so tatra janeti cittaṃ chindanti te hi pṛthu aṅgamaṅgam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_7.34_2: tathā na mahyaṃ śiva śānti nirvṛtī yāvanna sthāpye imi agrabodhaye //

S04bsu034_u:43_0: tatra punarapi bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipularaiprameyairacintyairaparimāṇairyadāsīt /
S04bsu034_u:43_1: tena kālena tena samayena abhāvasamudgato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:43_2: tat kiṃ manyase kumāra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'bhāvasamudgata ityucyate? sa khalu punaḥ kumāra tathāgato jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā imāmevaṃrūpāṃ vācamabhāṣata - abhāvasamudgatāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S04bsu034_u:43_4: tena ca kumāra śabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ svareṇābhivijñapto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:43_5: tatra bhaumān devānupādāya yāvad brahmalokaṃ paraṃparayā śabdamudīrayāmāsuḥ ghoṣamanuśrāvayāmāsuḥ - abhāvasamudgato batāyaṃ tathāgato bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu034_u:43_6: yo jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātramabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā abhāvaśabdamudīrayati /
S04bsu034_u:43_7: iti hyabhāvasamudgato 'bhāvasamudgata iti tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamudapādi /
S04bsu034_u:43_8: tasya ca bhagavato bodhiprāptasya sarvavṛkṣapatrebhyaḥ sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ sarvaśailaśikharebhyaścābhāvasamudgataśabdo niścarati /
S04bsu034_u:43_9: yāvati ca tatra lokadhātau śabdaprajñaptiḥ sarvato 'bhāvasamudgatavijñaptiśabdo niścarati /
S04bsu034_u:43_10: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato 'bhāvasamudgatasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:43_11: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro yena bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenosaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu034_u:43_12: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt /

S04bsu034_u:56_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra pratipattisāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:83_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat subhāṣiteyaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatā sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāsamādhinirdeśaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.26_1: sarviṃ spṛha janenti nāyakasmin bhagavatu vāca śruṇitva arthayuktām //

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.45_1: eṣamāṇu varabodhimuttamāṃ kasya arthi smitu etu darśitam //

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.48_1: dhātucittu adhimuktikovidā kasya arthi smitu etu darśitam //

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.50_0: ṣaḍvikāra pṛthivī prakampitā padmakoṭya dharaṇītu utthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_14.51_0: yatrime sthita jinasya aurasā bodhisattva paramā maharddhikāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.61_0: yeṣa jñānamatulamacintiyaṃ teṣa grāhya na kadāci vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_14.61_1: cittagocariya pāramiṃ gatā teṣa arthi ahu nātha pṛcchami //
S04bsu034_u:srs_14.62_1: naiva tubhya skhalitūpalabhyate kasya arthi smitu etu darśitam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_14.63_0: śāriputra aniruddha kolitā ye ca anya sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.64_1: saṃjanetva karuṇāṃ vināyakā muñca ghoṣa paramārthakovidā //

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.67_1: jeṣṭhaputra sugatasya aurasāḥ sarvi prāñjalisthitāḥ sagauravāḥ //

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.84_1: rañjanīya śabdu bhuvi ekakṣaṇe kala tena bhonti sugatasya svare //
S04bsu034_u:srs_14.85_0: bheryo mṛdaṅgapaṇavāśca tathā śaṅkha saveṇu tathā vallariyo /

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.87_0: ekasvarā tu tava lokahitā nānādhimukti svaru niścarati /

S04bsu034_u:srs_14.89_0: prītiṃ janeti na ca rāgaratiṃ maitrīṃ janeti na ca doṣamatim /

S04bsu034_u:112_0: tatra bhagavāṃścandraprabhakumāramāmantrayate sma - tasmāt tarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhimudgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pravartayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,

S04bsu034_u:srs_21.20_1: eṣa deva tava bhrāta pāpako jīvitena na jātu nandate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.20_2: tau ca bhikṣu duvi ghora vaidyakā te vrajanti gaganena vidyayā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.21_0: te sma śrutva tava mūlamāgatā sarvi bhūta tava vijñapematha /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.21_1: kṣipra ghātaya ghora vaidyakā mā ti paści anutāpu bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.22_2: sarvasainyaparivārito nṛpo yatra bhikṣu vani taṃ upāgato //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.23_0: jñātva ghoramatidāruṇaṃ nṛpaṃ nāga yakṣa vani tatra ye sthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.23_1: iṣṭavarṣa tada tatra pātita tena rāja sahasenayā hato //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.24_0: pāpamitravacanena paśyathā kālu kṛtva tada rāja dāruṇam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.24_1: yena krodhu kṛtu dharmabhāṇake so avīci gatu ṣaṣṭijātiyo //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.25_0: te 'pi bhikṣu bahavopalambhikā yehi grāhitu rāja kṣatriyo /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.26_0: devatā yāya rāju codito yāya rakṣita dharmabhāṇakau /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.26_1: tāya buddha yatha gaṅgavālikā dṛṣṭva pūjita carantu cārikām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.27_0: ṣaṣṭikoṭiniyutā anūnakā yehi dharma śrutu sārdhu rājinā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.27_1: yehi bodhivaracittu pāditaṃ buddha bhūyi pṛthulokadhātuṣu //
S04bsu034_u:srs_21.28_1: tehi sarvimu samādhi bhadrakaṃ deśayitva dvipadendu nirvṛtā //
S04bsu034_u:135_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāt tarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāye 'nadhyavasitena jīvite nirapekṣeṇa bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:135_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? kāyajīvitādhyavasānahetorhi kumāra akuśaladharmābhisaṃskāro bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:135_2: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpakāyatastathāgataḥ prajñātavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:135_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? dharmakāyā hi buddhā bhagavanto dharmakāyaprabhāvitāśca na rūpakāyaprabhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:135_4: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatakāyaṃ prārthayitukāmena tathāgatakāyaṃ jñātukāmena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo vācayitavyo bhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:135_5: tatra kumāra tathāgatasya kāyaḥ śatapuṇyanirjātayā buddhyānekārthanirdeśo dharmanirjātaḥ ānimittaḥ sarvanimittāpagato gambhīraḥ apramāṇaḥ apramāṇadharmaḥ ānimittasvabhāvaḥ sarvanimittavibhāvitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:135_7: acintyaḥ cittabhūmivigataḥ sukhaduḥkhāviprakampyaḥ sarvaprapañcasamatikrānto 'nirdeśyo 'niketo buddhajñānaṃ prārthayitukāmānāṃ ghoṣapathasamatikrāntaḥ sasāro rāgasamatikrāntaḥ abhedyo doṣapathasamatikrānto dṛḍho mohapathasamatikrānto nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:135_8: śūnyatānirdeśena ajāto jātisamatikrāntaḥ anāsravaḥ vipākasamatikrāntaḥ nityo vyāhāreṇa /
S04bsu034_u:135_10: nirvṛtaḥ śabdena, śānto ghoṣeṇa, sāmānyaḥ saṃketena, saṃketaḥ paramārthena, paramārtho bhūtavacanena / śītalo niṣparidānaḥ animittaḥ amanyitaḥ aninditaḥ aprapañcitaḥ - alpaśabdo nirdeśena /
S04bsu034_u:135_11: aparyanto varṇanirdeśena, mahābhijñāparikarmanirjātaḥ asmṛtitaḥ avidūre mahābhijñāparikarmanirdeśena /
S04bsu034_u:136_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.1_1: imaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvitvā kāyaṃ buddhasya jñāsyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.6_0: bahū evaṃ pravakṣyanti dṛṣṭo me lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.8_1: na ca pramāṇaṃ kāyasya labdhaṃ tena acintiyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.9_0: yadi pramāṇaṃ labhyeta kāyo buddhasya ettakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.11_0: na caiṣa kenacijjātu samādhiḥ śāntu bhāvitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.12_1: samādherasya vaipulyāt kāyo mahyaṃ na dṛśyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.13_0: yasya vo yādṛśaṃ cittaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pi tādṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.15_0: yasya co mṛdukī saṃjñā nāmarūpasmi vartate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.16_1: tisro me pāpikāḥ saṃjñā naivotpannāḥ kadācana //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.17_0: anāsravaṃ ca me cittaṃ kalpakoṭyo hyacintiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.17_1: karomi cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na ca me kāyu dṛśyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.18_0: yathā ca yasya bhāvehi vimuktaṃ bhoti mānasam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.18_1: na tasya tehi bhāvehi bhūyo bhoti samāgamaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.19_1: svabhāvo jñātu cittasya bhūyo jñānaṃ pravartate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.20_1: kurvanti cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ yatra kāyo na labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.22_1: na jātu rūpakāyeṇa śakyaṃ prajñāpituṃ jino //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.24_0: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ gambhīraṃ yasya trāso na bheṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:137_0: tatra kumāra tathāgatasya kāyo nimittakarmaṇāpi na sukaraṃ jñātum /
S04bsu034_u:137_1: nīlo vā nīlavarṇo vā nīlanidarśano vā nīlanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_2: pīto vā pītavarṇo vā pītanidarśano vā pītanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_3: lohito vā lohitavarṇo vā lohitanidarśano vā lohitanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_4: avadāto vā avadātavarṇo vā avadātanidarśano vā avadātanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_5: mañjiṣṭho vā mañjiṣṭhavarṇo vā mañjiṣṭhanidarśano vā mañjiṣṭhanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_6: sphaṭiko vā sphaṭikavarṇo vā sphaṭikanidarśano vā sphaṭikanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_7: āgneyo vā agnivarṇo vā agninidarśano vā agninirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_8: sarpirmaṇḍopamo vā sarpirvarṇo vā sarpirnidarśano vā sarpirnirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_9: sauvarṇo vā suvarṇavarṇo vā suvarṇanidarśano vā suvarṇanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_10: vaidūryo vā vaidūryavarṇo vā vaidūryanidarśano vā vaidūryanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_11: vidyudvā vā vidyudvarṇo vā vidyunnidarśano vā vidyunnirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_12: brahmo vā brahmavarṇo vā brahmanidarśano vā brahmanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_13: devo vā devavarṇo vā devanidarśano vā devanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:137_14: iti hi kumāra tathāgatasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvanimittairapyacintyaḥ apyacintyanirdeśo rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā /
S04bsu034_u:137_15: na sukaraṃ sadevakenāpi lokena kāyasya pramāṇamudgrahītumanyatra sarvākārairacintyaḥ aprameyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:138_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.26_2: na teṣāṃ labhyate anto ettakā paramāṇavaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.30_1: śakyaṃ jānituṃ buddhasya viśeṣo hīdṛśo mama //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.33_1: tathā hi tasya kāyasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.34_0: aprameyā hi te dharmāḥ kalpakoṭyo niṣevitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.34_1: teno acintiyaḥ kāyo nirvṛto me prabhāsvaraḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.35_1: tathā hi kāyo buddhasya apramāṇo hyacintiyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.38_0: apramāṇaṃ yathākāśaṃ mātuṃ śakyaṃ na kenacit /
S04bsu034_u:srs_22.39_0: ye kāyamevaṃ jānanti buddhānāṃ te jinātmajāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:141_0: tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti /
S04bsu034_u:141_1: katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidaṃ niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvidam /
S04bsu034_u:141_3: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ partavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:141_6: tatra kumāra katamā dharmapratisaṃvidaḥ? imāḥ kumāra bodhisattvo dharmapratisaṃvida evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - yāvanto vā rūpavyāhārāstāvantastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:141_7: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / yāvantaḥ kumāra vijñānavyāhārāstāvantastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:141_8: iti hi kumāra aprameyā acintyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ atulyāmāpyāparimāṇāstathāgatasya rūpavarṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:141_9: iti hi kumāra aparyantā anantā rūpavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:141_11: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / iti hi anantā aparyantā acintyā vijñānavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:142_0: iti hi kumāra aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ saṃskṛte doṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:142_3: iti hi kumāra yāvanti nirvāṇanāmāni tāvantastathāgatasya varṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:143_0: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:143_2: acintyaḥ svaravyāhāraḥ / acintyaḥ saṃkleśavyāhāra / acintyo vyavadānavyāhāraḥ / ime kumāra catvārastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:143_3: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyanirdeśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:143_8: catasro yuktayaḥ / catvāro dvārāḥ / catvāra nirdeśāḥ / catvāro ghoṣāḥ / catvāro vacanapathāḥ / catvāro vyāhārāḥ / catvāri saṃghābhāṣyāṇi / catasro nāmanidhyaptayaḥ / catasro manujanidhyaptayaḥ / catvāri prativacanāni / catvāri dvārāṇi / catvāryakṣarāṇi / catvāro 'vatārāḥ / catvāraḥ padāḥ / catvāri nirhārapadāni / catvāraḥ sūtrāntapadāḥ / catvāraścaryāpathāḥ / catvāro 'cintyapathāḥ / catvāraḥ tulyapathāḥ / catvāro 'nantapathāḥ / catvāro 'paryantapathāḥ / catvāro 'saṃkhyeyapathāḥ / catvāro 'prameyapathāḥ / catvāro 'parimāṇapathāḥ / [Vaidya_148] catvḥri jñḥnḥni /
S04bsu034_u:143_9: catvḥro jñḥnasaṃcayḥḥ / catvḥri jñḥnagotrḥṇi / catvḥri pratibhḥnḥni / catvḥraḥ pratibhḥnasaṃcayḥḥ /
S04bsu034_u:143_10: catvḥri pratibhḥnagotrḥṇi / catvḥraḥ sūtrḥntasaṃcayḥḥ / catvḥri pratibhḥnakaraṇḥni / catvḥraḥ sūtrḥntanirhḥrḥḥ / catvḥri bḥhuśrutyagotrḥṇi / catvḥri buddhadhanḥni / catasro bodhisattvaśikṣḥḥ / catvḥro bodhisattvagocarḥḥ / catvḥri bodhisattvakarmḥṇi / catvḥri bodhisattvapratibhḥnḥni /
S04bsu034_u:143_11: catasro mḥrgabhḥvanḥḥ / catvḥri kleśaprahḥṇḥni / catvḥryapḥyajahanḥni / catvḥryajñḥnavidhamanḥni / catvḥryavidyḥprahḥṇḥni / catvḥri duḥkhopaśamanḥni / catvḥri daurmanasyaprahḥṇḥni /
S04bsu034_u:143_12: catvḥryupḥyasaṃjananḥni / catvḥri dṛṣṭiprahḥṇḥni / catvḥryupapannaparijñḥnḥni / catvḥryḥtmadṛṣṭiprahḥṇḥni / catvḥri sattvadṛṣṭiprahḥṇḥni /
S04bsu034_u:144_0: catasro dhāraṇyaḥ / katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta anantaḥ sarvasaṃskāraparibhāṣāvyāhāraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:144_8: imāścatasro dhāraṇyaḥ / iti hi yā kumāra dhāraṇī tajjñānam,
S04bsu034_u:144_9: sa dharmaḥ / iti hi dharmajñānena dharmapratisaṃvit /
S04bsu034_u:145_2: dharmajñāne yā vyavahāradeśanā ācakṣaṇā prajñapanā prakāśanā prasthāpanā vicaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkaraṇatā asaktavacanatā anelāmūkavacanatā anavalīnavacanatā,
S04bsu034_u:146_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_23.4_0: anantā nāmavyāhārā ye me pūrvaṃ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_23.4_1: śīlanāmā buddhanāmā sattvanāmā ca te samāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_23.5_0: yāttakāḥ saṃskṛte doṣā nirvāṇe tāttakā guṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_23.5_1: buddhasya tāttakā varṇā aupamyā me prakāśitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_23.13_0: yathā yathā prakāśenti śraddadhanto imaṃ nayam /
S04bsu034_u:149_0: tatra kumāra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmapratisaṃvidi caran dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī nānyatra rūpeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu034_u:149_7: anyad rūpamanyo rūpasvabhāva iti naivaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:149_9: yaśca rūpasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā /
S04bsu034_u:149_11: evaṃ nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānena bodhiṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu034_u:149_20: yaśca vijñānasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā /
S04bsu034_u:150_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.1_0: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.2_0: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.2_1: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.3_1: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.5_0: nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtī vuttā nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.7_0: paśyitvā kāyu buddhasya vakṣyante dṛṣṭu nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.7_1: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.9_0: evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.10_1: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.13_1: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.13_2: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.15_0: prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.15_1: ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.24_1: praviśya ca gṛhāṃsteṣāṃ dūṣayiṣyanti tān kulān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.27_1: yathā te pravrajitvā hi paradāreṣu mūrcchitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.28_1: sā śikṣā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tasmin kāle na bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.29_1: yā ca sā uttamā pūjā pratipattirna bheṣyati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.31_0: śrutvā śīlasya te varṇaṃ duḥśīlāḥ pāpagocarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.32_0: na ca hrī bheṣyate teṣāṃ naṣṭaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ dhanam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.34_0: na me śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā yeṣāmetādṛśī carī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.35_0: yā teṣāṃ kuhanā tatra śāṭhiyaṃ vākkiyaṃ tadā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.35_1: jānāmi tadahaṃ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ me 'tra pravartate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.36_0: sacet kalpaṃ prabhāṣeyaṃ yatteṣāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.37_1: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārdhaṃ kuryāstvaṃ kāli paścime //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.39_1: kuryā hi gauravaṃ tatra śirasā pādavandanam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.40_1: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.41_1: yādṛśaṃ kāhitī karma lapsyate tādṛśaṃ phalam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.43_1: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyāstvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_24.45_0: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyyā āyuṣmān vijña paṇḍitaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:153_0: tatra bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhiṃ kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakuśalena bhavitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:159_0: tasmāttarhi kumāra apramatto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam,

S04bsu034_u:162_2: daśeme kumāra anuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /

S04bsu034_u:166_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ kṣāntipratiṣṭhitasya maitrīvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:166_2: śastreṇa na hanyate / viṣamasya na kramate / udakena na mriyate / devatāścainaṃ rakṣanti / lakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:166_7: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ kṣāntipratiṣṭhitasya maitrīvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /

S04bsu034_u:170_1: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā dhyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:170_3: gocare carati / niṣparidāho viharati / guptendriyo bhavati / prītimanubhavati / viviktaḥ kāmaiḥ / atṛpto dhyānaiḥ / mukto māraviṣayāt / pratiṣṭhito buddhaviṣaye / vimuktiṃ paripācayati / ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dhyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /

S04bsu034_u:172_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ prajñācaritasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /

S04bsu034_u:175_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā bahuśrutasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /

S04bsu034_u:srs_28.36_1: mārga utpatha varjeti ṛjuke mārgi tiṣṭhati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.38_0: jānāti dharmaṃ pṛthu sāṃkileśikaṃ vyavadānapakṣaṃ pi tathaiva jānati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.38_1: sa saṃkileśaṃ parivarjayitvā vyodāni saṃśikṣati dharmi uttame //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.39_0: kāṅkṣāṃ ca so vivarati sarvaprāṇināṃ dṛṣṭī ca tasyo bhavati sadojjvakā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.39_1: sa utpathaṃ mārgu vivarjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhate ṛjuki pathe sadā śive //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.40_0: amṛtasya dvāre bhavatī sadā sthito āsanna bhotī vipulāya bodhaye /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.40_1: ālokabhūtaḥ pṛthu sarvaprāṇināṃ na cāpyasau bhāyati durgatibhyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:177_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā dharmadānagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:177_4: bodhimaṇḍamarpayati / vastuṃ parityajati / kleśānnigṛhvāti / sarvasattvebhyaḥ pratyaṃśaṃ [Vaidya_166] dadāti /
S04bsu034_u:177_7: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dharmadānagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.43_0: buddhakṣetraṃ ca śodheti kṣetraṃ bhoti syanuttaram /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.45_1: anīrṣukaśca so bhoti saukhyaṃ bhoti syamānuṣam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.46_0: vivarjitā akriyā paṇḍitena kriyāya so nitya viduḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.46_1: mahātmadharmeṣu sadā pratiṣṭhito yo dharmadānaṃ sada deti paṇḍitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.47_0: kṣetraṃ ca tasya sada bhoti śuddhaṃ dharmā vivardhantimi bodhipākṣikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.47_1: āsanna bhoti sada bodhimaṇḍe dharmaṃ daditvā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.48_0: kleśā na santī parityakta vastūn vastuṃ parijñātu svalakṣaṇena /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.48_1: vimukta sarvehi parigrahehi na tasya saṅgo bhavatī kadācit //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.49_0: upasthitaṃ cittu vicakṣaṇasya sarve 'pi sattvā sukhino bhavantu /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.49_1: sa maitracitto bhavatī anīrṣyuko dṛṣṭeva dharme 'sya sukhaṃ analpakam //
S04bsu034_u:179_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ śūnyatāvihāriṇo bodhisatvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:179_2: aniśrito dhyāyati / upapattiṃ na prārthayati / śīlaṃ na parāmṛśati / [Vaidya_167] āryānnāpavadati /
S04bsu034_u:179_3: aviruddho viharati / vastu nopalabhate / viviktaśca bhavati / buddhānnābhyākhyāyati / saddharmaṃ dhārayati / ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ śūnyatāvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.50_1: teno viharate yogī yatra jīvo na labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.51_0: aniśritaḥ sarvaloke āryaṃ dhyānaṃ na riñcati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.53_1: vastuṃ nopalabhed yogī vivikto viharī sadā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.56_0: ye te vihārāḥ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ yasminnabhūmiḥ pṛthutīrthikānām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.56_1: viharatyasau tairiha bodhisattvo yasminna sattvo na jīvu na pudgalaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.57_0: na niśrayastasya kadāci vidyate aniśritaḥ sevate dhyānasaukhyam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.57_1: nirātma niḥsattva viditva dharmānupapattisaṃjñāsya na jātu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.58_0: svabhāvu dharmāṇa prajānataśca śīle 'pi tasyeha na kaści niśrayaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.58_1: śīlena no manyati jātu śuddhiṃ prasādamāryeṣu karoti nityam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.59_0: virodhu tasyo na kadāci bhoti vibhāvitāḥ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.59_1: na cāpi so 'bhyākhyāti nāyakānāṃ saddharma dhāritva tathāgatānām //
S04bsu034_u:181_1: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ pratisaṃlayanābhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:181_3: apramatto viharati / buddhamanusmarati / caryāṃ śraddadhāti / jñāne na kāṅkṣati / kṛtajño bhavati / buddhānāṃ dharmaṃ na pratikṣipati /
S04bsu034_u:181_4: susaṃvṛto viharati / dāntabhūmimanuprāpnoti/ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkaroti / ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ pratisaṃlayanābhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.61_0: śrutvā ca lokanāthānāṃ caryāṃ buddhāna śraddadhe /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.61_1: jñāne na kāṅkṣate yogī buddhajñāne acintiye //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.63_0: pratisaṃvidaḥ sa labhate ya eko ramate sadā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.64_0: cittaṃ ca tasyo bhavati anāvilaṃ sarve pramādāḥ parivarjitāsya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.65_0: smaritva buddhān dvipadānamuttamān śraddhāti teṣāṃ cariyāmanuttarām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.65_1: na kāṅkṣati jñānu tathāgatānāṃ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.66_0: buddhāna so bhoti sadā kṛtajño na jīvitārthaṃ sa kṣipeta dharmam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.66_1: susaṃvṛto viharati nityakālaṃ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.67_0: sa dāntabhūmīmanuprāpta bhoti pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣikaroti kṣipram /
S04bsu034_u:183_0: sa buddhabodhiṃ parigṛhṇate laghum ārakṣate śāsanu nāyakasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.68_0: sa buddhabodhiṃ parigṛhṇate laghum ārakṣate śāsanu nāyakasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.68_2: nihanitva so sarvaparapravādinaḥ karoti vaistārika buddhabodhim //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.69_0: itaścyavitvāna sa bodhisattvaḥ sukhāvatīṃ gacchati lokadhātum /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.69_1: anutpādadharmeṣu ca kṣānti lapsyate amitāyuṣo dharmavarāgru śrutvā //
S04bsu034_u:184_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā araṇyavāsagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:184_2: gaṇaṃ varjayati / vivādo 'sya na bhavati / avyāvadhyo bhavati / āsravāna vardhayati / adhikaraṇaṃ na karoti / upaśāntaścarati / susaṃvṛtaśva viharati / mokṣānukūlā cāsya cittasaṃtatirbhavati /
S04bsu034_u:184_4: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā araṇyavāsagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.70_0: alpakṛtyaḥ sadā bhoti gaṇaṃ varjeti dūrataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.73_1: na vivadati kadāci mukta yogī imi guṇa tasya bhavatyaraṇyavāse //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.74_0: yada bhavati nirviṇṇu saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya spṛhā kahiṃci loke /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.74_1: na ca bhavati vivṛddhirāsravāṇāṃ vani vasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.75_0: adhikaraṇu na jātu cāsya bhoti upaśāntarato vivekacārī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.75_1: vacasi manasi kāye saṃvṛtasyo bahu guṇa tasya bhavantyaraṇyavāse //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.76_0: bhavati ca anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratipadyati so vimukti śāntam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.76_1: vani vasati vimukti sevato 'syā imi guṇa bhonti araṇyavāsi sarve //
S04bsu034_u:186_0: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍacārikasya dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:186_1: katame daśa? yaduta jñātrakāmatāsya na bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:186_2: yaśaskāmatāsya na bhavati / lābhasatkārakāmatāsya na bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:186_5: ātmānaṃ notkarṣayati / parānna paṃsayati / anunayapratighaprahīṇaḥ paragṛhe carati /
S04bsu034_u:186_8: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍapātikasya dhūpaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.78_0: notsṛjatyāryavaṃśaṃ ca kuhanā lapanā na ca /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.78_1: utkarṣeti na cātmānaṃ parān paṃsayate na ca //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.79_1: grāhyaṃ si vacanaṃ bhoti piṇḍapāte guṇā amī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.80_0: na mārgate jñātra yaśo na lābhaṃ caturāryavaṃśe bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.80_1: akuhako alapaku bhoti paṇḍito dhūtādhimuktasya imīdṛśā guṇāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.81_0: nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsī puruṣaṃ pi ukto na kadāci kupyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.81_1: varṇaṃ pi śrutvā janaye na harṣaṃ yaḥ piṇḍapātena bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.82_0: nirāmiṣaṃ deti ca dharmadānaṃ na lābhasatkāra gaveṣate 'sau /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.82_1: grāhyā ca tasya bhavate 'sya bhāṣitaṃ dhūtādhimuktasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:188_0: iti hi kumāra evaṃrūpeṣu dhūtaguṇeṣu pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇye viharan buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:188_3: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?imāḥ kumāra vivekacārī bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:188_4: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:188_5: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:188_7: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:188_8: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate? yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu034_u:188_9: taṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā sarvaṃ śṛṇoti /
S04bsu034_u:188_11: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:188_12: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate? yena jñānena sarvadharmānārādhayati /
S04bsu034_u:188_15: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:188_16: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate? so 'bhijñayā atītānāgatapratyutpannasattvacittacaritajñānamavatarati /
S04bsu034_u:188_17: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:188_18: saṃkṣiptena kumāra evaṃguṇadharmapratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmān pratilabhate yatrābhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām,
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.83_0: buddhanidhānaṃ ca dharmanidhānaṃ jñānanidhānaṃ ca pūrvāntanidhānam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_28.83_1: pañca abhijñāḥ sa kṣipraṃ labhati yo vidu raṇṇi sadā sthitu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:192_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra divyāni cakravartirājyaiśvaryasukhānyapahāya pravrajiṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:192_1: pravrajitena kumāra dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitena vivekacāriṇā kṣāntisauratyasaṃpannena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:192_2: sadā ca ārabdhavīryeṇa te kumāra ādīptaśiraścailopamena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ pravartayitavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo 'raṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:192_4: khaṅgaviṣāṇabhūtena advitīyena ca te kumāra araṇyaniṣeviṇā sadā bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:192_5: ātmaparityāgenāpi te kumāra sarvasattvānāmarthaḥ sadā karaṇīya iti /
S04bsu034_u:193_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmetamevārthamudbhāvayaṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ pūrvayogakathāparivartaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.1_0: smaramī atīta bahukalpaśatā yada āsi nāyaku anantayaśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.2_1: dhūtavṛtta saṃlekhita śāntamanāḥ iti tasya tena samayena gaṇāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.3_1: ratanāna saptana viśiṣṭavarā iha jambudvīpi tada kāli abhūt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.4_0: tada kāli te puravarā sakalāḥ pratimaṇḍitā bahu udyānaśataiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.8_0: iti pakṣi samāgata kāli tadā kalaviṅkamayūravihaṅgarutaiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.8_1: parapuṣṭa śārika vicitra dvijā bahupakṣighoṣaruta nānavidhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.11_0: tahi kāli rāja iha jambudhvaje dṛḍhadattu āsi manujādhipatiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.11_1: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ paramadarśanikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.12_0: tahi kāli rājyu śivu kṣema abhūt anupadrutaṃ suramaṇīya śivam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.12_1: ayu jambudvīpa kusumairnicito nirviṃśeṣa devabhavanehi samam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.13_0: tahi kāli so daśabalo anidho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.13_1: svapnopamā bhavagatī sakalā na va kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.14_0: na sattva labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.15_0: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloki saṃkramati gacchati vā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.15_1: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalameti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.16_0: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca ucchedu puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.16_1: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punaraspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.17_0: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.17_1: na ca dṛṣṭisthānu gatiśuddhiriho na ca sattvacaru na praśāntagatī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.18_0: anupādu śāntu animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocaru jināna guṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.18_1: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā //
S04bsu034_u:195_0: na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.20_0: na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.20_2: na ca dharmadhātu vrajatīha kvaci evaṃ gatī agati dharmagatī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.21_0: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu svabhāvagatī gatiyo svabhāvu na kahiṃci sthitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.21_1: asthitā aniśritā svabhāvagatī jinagocaro viraju śāntapadam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.22_0: śāntapraśānta upaśāntagatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.22_1: bhāvu svabhāvu nugatāḥ satataṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśu padaṃ acalam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.23_0: na ca sā calā hi svayameva sthitā asthitā anāgata svabhāvu sthitā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.23_1: na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharmasthitī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.24_0: ghoṣaśca ukta na ca ghoṣagatī ghoṣasvabhāvagati dharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.24_1: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharmagatī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.25_0: gatiśabda uktu na ca sattvagatī dharmasvabhāva nipuṇārthagatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.25_1: ghoṣo 'pi coktu na ca sattvagatī na ca ghoṣu labhyati na sattvagatiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.26_0: na ca ananta nānta na ca madhyagatiḥ naivāsti nāsti na ca deśagatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.26_1: jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāvagatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.27_0: virajaṃ viśuddhi paramārthapadaṃ śānta praśānta arajaṃ virajam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.27_1: na ca kalpa manyana praśāntapadaṃ jinu bhāṣate paramakāruṇiko //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.28_0: na pi cāsti akṣarapracāra iho vipulā gatirvipulā arthagatī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.28_1: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharmanaya sūkṣmagatī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.29_0: dharmanidhāna virajaṃ vipulaṃ yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā /

S04bsu034_u:srs_29.113_1: so saṃśayaṃ chinatti sarvajage imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī //

S04bsu034_u:srs_29.114_1: tān satkareyyā bahu kalpaśatān yatha gaṅgavāluka tathottari vā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.115_0: yaścaiva paści kṣayakāli imaṃ śrutvā samādhimiha kaści naraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.115_1: anumodamīti bhaṇataikagiraṃ kala puṇyaskandha na sa pūrva bhavet //
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.116_0: yasyo kumāra iya śāntagatī paramārthaśūnyata samādhivaro /
S04bsu034_u:srs_29.116_1: prāvartu bhoti tatha pustagataḥ so dharmabhāṇaku sthitaḥ sumatiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:205_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra ya ākāṅkṣed bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - kimityahaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rutamadhigaccheyamindriyāṇāṃ ca parāparajñatāṃ vijñāya dharmaṃ deśayeyamiti,
S04bsu034_u:205_1: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:206_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.1_0: aparimita atīta nāyakāstena dṛṣṭāḥ puratu katha prayuktā pṛcchitā lokanāthāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.1_1: pravara kuśalamūle tiṣṭhato bodhisattvo imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.1_6: varṇu śruṇiya udāraṃ harṣu tasyo na bhoti
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.1_7: na pi ca punaravarṇe maṅkubhāvaṃ nigacchet /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.4_0: akhilamadhuravāṇī ślakṣṇavācā suyuktā apagatabhrukuṭiśco pūrvaālāpi bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.4_1: satatasmitamukhaśco śikṣito nāyakānām imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.5_0: bhavati sa sukhavāsaḥ sūrataḥ snigdhacitto bhavati sada sudānto dāntabhūmisthitaśca /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.5_1: sumadhura priyavāṇī snigdhasatyābhidhāyī imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:207_0: na ca sa katha karotī vaigrahīṃ no vivādān apagatakhila doṣā varjitāstena śeṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.6_0: na ca sa katha karotī vaigrahīṃ no vivādān apagatakhila doṣā varjitāstena śeṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.6_2: pramuditu sada bhotī sūrato mārdavaśca imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.7_0: bhavati ca sada vidvāṃstyāgi nityābhiyuktaḥ sudukhita jana dṛṣṭvā teṣamannaṃ dadāti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.7_1: priyataru parityaktuṃ bhoti nityaṃ sudātā imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.8_0: devaśatasahasrāṇa spṛhāṃ ye saṃjanentī nāga asura yakṣā nityupasthāyakāsya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.8_1: vani pavani vasante rakṣa tasyā karontī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayati //
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.9_1: pañcaśatasvarāṅgo harṣaṇīyasvaraśco bhavati naditaśabdo ghuṣṭaśabdaḥ suśabdaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.10_0: yāvatatu pṛthu kṣatrāṇa naraḥ kaścideva sūkṣma raja kareyyā śakya te lakṣaṇāya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_30.10_1: tatu bahutaru tasyo ye svarā niścarantī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayāti //
S04bsu034_u:210_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra ya ākāṅkṣed bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kimityahaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmiti,
S04bsu034_u:210_1: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavya uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyaḥ araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:211_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.1_0: tasyo rāgu na jātu kupyate na ca doṣo tasyo moha na jātu kupyate vṛṣabhisya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.1_1: teno sarvi kileśa cchoritānavaśeṣā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.2_0: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu oṣirī sugatānāṃ so 'sau śūru na jātu istriyāṇāṃ vaśameti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.2_1: so 'sau śāsani prīti vindate sugatānāṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.3_0: so 'sau jñānavidhijña paṇḍito matimāṃśca so 'sau buddha ananta paśyatī aparyantāṃ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.3_1: so 'sau dhāraṇijñānu jānatī aparyantaṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī nayayuktim //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.4_0: so 'sau neha cireṇa bheṣyati dvipadendraḥ so 'sau vaidyu bhiṣaku bheṣyate sukhadātā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.4_1: so 'sau uddhari śalya sarvaśo dukhitānāṃ yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.5_0: so 'sau āturu jñātva duḥkhitānimi sattvān so 'sau bherī sadā parāhanī amṛtasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.5_1: so 'sau bheṣyati nāyako jino nacireṇa yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.6_0: so 'sau bhaiṣajyanayeṣu kovido varavaidyo ādiṃ jānati sarvavyādhināṃ yatra muktiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.6_1: so 'sau bhūtanayaśikṣito matimanto śikṣitvā bahusattva mocayī pṛthu naṣṭān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.7_0: so 'sau śūnyanayeṣu kovido matiśūraḥ so 'sau loki asaktu bhuñjati sada piṇḍam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.7_1: so 'sau bodhivarāya sthāpayi bahusattvān yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.8_0: so 'sau kṣāntibalena udgato naracandraḥ so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍatāḍito na ca kupyī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.8_1: so 'sau chidyatu aṅgamaṅgaśo na ca kṣubhye yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.9_0: so 'sau kṣāntibale pratiṣṭhito balavanto so 'sau kṣāntiya vastu tādṛśo supraśāntaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.9_1: so 'sau kṣāntibalena manyate matiśūro yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.10_0: so 'sau vastu na jātu manyate ahu cchinnā teno sarvi bhavā vibhāvitāḥ sada śūnyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.10_1: tasyo saṃjñā prahīṇa sarvaśo nikhileno yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.11_0: te te dharmasvabhāvu deśayī supraṇītaṃ te te bodhi spṛśī anuttarāṃ nacireṇa /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.11_1: yeṣāṃ dharmasvabhāvu gocaraḥ sunidhyapto teṣāṃ datta ananta dakṣiṇā aparyantā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.12_0: so 'sau bhāṣati sūtrakoṭiyo aparyantā yatha gaṅganadīya vālikāstatu bhūyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.12_1: no cāsyu pratibhānu chidyate varṇamāne yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:212_0: so 'sau kalpasahasrakoṭiśo nayutāni jñāneno sada bhoti udgato yatha meruḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.13_1: dharma tasya kṣayo na vidyate bhaṇamāne yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.14_0: vistīrṇaṃ vipulaṃ acintiyaṃ pratibhānaṃ bhotī bodhivarāṃ gaveṣataḥ sada tasyo /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.14_1: nityaṃ bhāṣati sūtrakoṭiyo aparyantā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.15_0: yaṃ caite dvipadottamā jinā bhaṇi dharmaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca śruṇitva gṛhṇatī paripūrṇam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.15_1: no vā ekapade 'pi vidyate vimatisyo yo 'sau sarvi abhāva jānatī imi dharmān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.16_0: so 'sau bhoti viśiṣṭa tyāgavān sada kālaṃ bhotī dānapatiḥ sukhaṃdado dukhitānām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.16_1: dṛṣṭā duḥkhita sattva tarpayī ratanehī yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.17_0: sau 'sau jambudhvaje bhaviṣyatī sada rājā sattvānāṃ sada saukhya kāhitī aparyantam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.17_1: maitrāye samupetu prāṇīnāṃ sada kāle yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.18_0: putrān dhītara dāsadāsiyo tyajya dhīro hastau pāda śirāṃsi sa tyajī tatha rājyam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.18_1: no cālīyati tasya mānasaṃ vṛṣabhisyo yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.19_0: aṅgāṅgaṃ puna tasya chidyatī yadi kāyo no tasya pratihanyate manaḥ supine 'pi /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.19_1: teno pūjita bhonti nāyakā dvipadendrā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.20_0: teno pūjita sarvi nāyakā ya atītāstatha pūjita ye anāgatā dvipadendrāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.20_1: tehī satkṛta sarvi nāyakā sthita ye co yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī sada śūnyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.21_0: so 'sau kośa dhareti paṇḍitaḥ sugatānāṃ so 'sau dhāraṇiye pratiṣṭhitaḥ paramāyām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.21_1: so 'sau bheṣyati lokanāyako naciareṇa yacchutvā imu sūtraṃ dhārayet kṣayakāle //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.22_0: so 'ndho naiva kadāci bheṣyatī vidu jātu no co aṅgavihīnu bheṣyatī bahukalpān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.22_1: teno akṣaṇa aṣṭa varjitā imi nityaṃ yeno sūtramidaṃ prabhāṣitaṃ apramuṣṭam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.23_0: nāsau durgatiṣu gamiṣyati puna jātu nityaṃ lakṣaṇadhāri bheṣyatī abhirūpaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.23_1: pacco tasya abhijña bhāvitā imi nityaṃ purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sada śūraḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.24_0: bahukān nirmita nirmiṇitvāna ayu jñānī preṣatī bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu vinayārtham /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.24_1: yehi dṛṣṭa bhavanti nirmitā bahu buddhāḥ tehī bodhivarāya sthāpitā bahu sattvāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.25_0: smṛtimantaḥ gatimantaḥ prajñāvān dhṛtimāṃśca sthāmnā vīryabalena so sadā samupetaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.25_1: dharmapāramiprāpta bheṣyati mahatejā yaḥ śrutvā imu sūtra dhārayet kṣayakāle //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.26_0: raśmikoṭisahasra niścarī sada teṣāṃ vyomāḥ sarvi karonti maṇḍalāḥ suriyāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.26_1: yehī bhāvita bhonti śūnyakā imi dharmāste te śūra bhavanti nāyakā nacireṇa //
S04bsu034_u:213_0: eṣo gocaru śāntu bhāvito maya pūrvaṃ bahukalpāna sahasra koṭiyo niyutāni /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.27_0: eṣo gocaru śāntu bhāvito maya pūrvaṃ bahukalpāna sahasra koṭiyo niyutāni /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.27_2: vīryaṃ me na kadāci sahasita iha mārge yadahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa vyākṛto jinabhūmī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.28_0: yūyaṃ pī mama caryā śikṣathā iha sūtre gambhīrā paramārtha deśitā iya netrī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.28_1: yatrāmī bahu naṣṭa tīrthikā viparitā kṣiptvā bodhimapāyi bhairave prapatanti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.29_0: bahukalpāna sahasrakoṭiyo nayutāni veditvā amu tatra vedanā kaṭu tībrāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.29_1: bahukalpā nayutānamatyayāt punareva hetuḥ so amṛtasya prāptaye bhaviṣyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.30_0: ye te paścimi kāli bhairave sugatasyo rakṣanti imu sūtramīdṛśaṃ praśāntam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_31.30_1: teṣāṃ bodhi varā na durlabhā iya śreṣṭhā te te paścimi kāli vyākṛta dhari dharmān //
S04bsu034_u:216_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhijñāparikarma dhārayitukāmenāyaṃ samādhirdhārayitavyaḥ udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:216_2: katamacca tat kumāra sarvadharmāṇāmabhijñāparikarma? yaduta sarvadharmāṇāmaparigrahaḥ aparāmarśaḥ śīlaskandhasyāmanyanā samādhiskandhasya apracāraḥ prajñāskandhasya vivekadarśanaṃ vimuktiskandhasya yathābhūtadarśanaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhasya svabhāvaśūnyatādarśanaṃ sarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:216_3: yayābhijñayā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasamādhivikurvitāni vikurvan sarvasattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu034_u:217_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.1_1: vivāde yastu carati sodgṛhṇan na vimucyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.2_0: abhijñā tasya sā prajñā bauddhaṃ jñānamacintiyam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.2_1: udgrahe yaḥ sthito bhoti jñānaṃ tasya na vidyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.6_0: ekaṃ padārthaṃ cintetvā sarve te bhonti bhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.7_1: asmin pade tu śikṣitvā buddhadharmā na durlabhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.8_1: ye dharmatāṃ prajānanti na virodhenti dharmatām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.9_1: diśo daśa gaveṣitvā buddhavāg naiva labhyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.10_0: eṣā vācā buddhavācā gaveṣitvā diśo daśa /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.10_1: na labhyate 'nuttaraiṣā na labdhā na ca lapsyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.12_1: aṇumātro na co labdho loke śabdena deśitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.13_1: ya evaṃ dharma jānanti budhyante bodhimuttamām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.15_1: tena buddhā iti proktā buddhajñānā prabodhanāt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.17_0: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manastathā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.18_1: nāsau vivādaṃ kurute jñātvā dharmāṇa lakṣaṇam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.19_1: na te kadācit kāṅkṣanti jānante dharmaśūnyatām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.23_0: na buddhadharmā deśasthā na pradeśastha kīrtitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.23_1: na cotpannā niruddhā va ekatvena pṛthak tathā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.24_0: na te navāḥ purāṇā vā na teṣāmasti manyanā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.24_1: na ca nīlā na pītā va nāvadatā na lohitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.25_1: na ca ghoṣasya sā bhūmiḥ prātihāryaṃ muneridam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.26_0: anāsravā hi te dharmā- nena ucyanti hi /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.26_1: stṛtā aparyāpannā daśadiśe eṣā buddhāna deśanā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.28_0: na cāsau labhyate sattvo nirvṛtiryena sparśitā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.28_1: evaṃ ca diśito dharmo bahavaḥ sattva mocitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.29_1: na ca yāti svakaṃ bimbamevaṃ dharmāṇa lakṣaṇam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.31_0: avigraho hyayaṃ dharmo vigraho nātra kaścana /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.31_1: avigrahaśca yo dharma eṣa buddhasya vigrahaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.32_0: dharmakāyena paśyanti ye te paśyanti nāyakam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.33_1: imāṃ gatiṃ vijānīta śrāmaṇyena hi ye 'rthikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.34_0: aprāpti prāpti nirdiṣṭā sattvānāṃ jñātva āśayam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.34_1: yo saṃdhābhāṣyottarate na so kena vihanyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.35_0: yasya bhoti mayā prāptamaprāptaṃ tena cocyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.36_0: kathaṃ gambhīrime dharmā vakṣyante ye na śikṣitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.36_1: te ca gambhīranāmena na śakyaṃ parikīrtitum //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.37_0: avastukāḥ pañca skandhā abhūtvā eta utthitāḥ /
