S04bsu034_u:srs_32.198_0: sthāmenupeto bhavati anopameyo sa balenupeto bhavati nityakālam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.198_1: no tasya loke bhavati samaḥ kadācid ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.199_0: yadāpi rājā sa bhavati cakravartīṃ manujānu loke upagata jambudvīpe /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.199_1: tadāpi bhotī bahujanapūjanīyo viśeṣaprāpto matima viśiṣṭaprajñaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.200_0: ye bhonti mukhyāḥ kularatanā viśiṣṭāḥ suprabhūtabhogā bahujanasvāpateyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.200_1: yatrāśva hastī rathavara yugyayānā hiraṇyasvarṇaṃ maṇīratanaṃ prabhūtam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.201_0: ye śrāddha bhontī iha varabuddhajñāne te jambudvīpe kularatanābhiyuktāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.201_1: tatropapannaḥ kularatane viśiṣṭe karoti so 'rthaṃ suvipula jñātisaṃghe //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.202_0: aśrāddha ye vā iha kula jambudvipe śraddhāṃ sa teṣāṃ janayati apramattaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.202_1: yaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhiti sattvakāye te buddha bhontī jinapravaraḥ svayaṃbhūḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.203_0: te ca spṛśitva atuliyamagrabodhiṃ cakraṃ pravartentyasadṛśa buddhakṣetre /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.203_1: ye co vijānī imu tada dharmacakraṃ anutpattidharme nikhila te saṃpratiṣṭhī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.204_0: subahukarāśco ami tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvāna bhonti satatu te pūjanīyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.204_1: karonti te 'rthaṃ atuliya nityakālaṃ sattvāna cakṣurvitimiru te janenti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.205_0: bahava śatasahasrāḥ sattvakoṭī anantā yeṣa kuśalamūlā bhonti tatra śruṇitvā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.205_1: te api pratilabhante uttamaṃ bodhicittaṃ yada jinu anuśāsī bodhisattvaṃ mahātmā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.206_0: aśūnyakṣetrā pramudita bhonti nityaṃ nirupalepā ami tada buddha bhontī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.206_1: yatra sthihantī imi tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvānamartha aparimitaṃ karonti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.207_0: rakṣanti śīlaṃ asadṛśu brahmacaryaṃ bhāvī samādhī vipulamanantakalpān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.207_1: dhyāne vimokṣe suniśrita nityakālaṃ te bodhisattvā bhavi sada buddhaputrāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:220_0: te ṛddhipādān satat niṣevamāṇā kṣetrāṇi gatvā bahu vividhānanantān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.208_0: te ṛddhipādān satat niṣevamāṇā kṣetrāṇi gatvā bahu vividhānanantān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.208_2: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ sugatavaraprabhāṣaṃ sarvaṃ ca gṛhṇī pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.209_0: prabhāṣi sūtrānaparimitānanantān ye dhāraṇīye pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.209_1: sattvāna arthaṃ aparimitaṃ karonti ye dhāraṇīye pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.210_1: yādṛśaṃ taiḥ kṛtaṃ karma vipāko 'pi ca tādṛśaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.212_0: śūnyatā ca mahātmānāṃ vihāro bhoti uttamaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.215_1: na teṣāṃ vartate saṃjñā istrisaṃjñā svabhāvatā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.217_0: na cātra paśyate māraṃ mārasainyaṃ ca paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.217_1: na ca paśyati mārasya tisro duhitaro 'pi saḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.219_0: sumeravaḥ samudrāśca yāva santi daśā diśe /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.219_1: taṃ ca sattvā vijānanti sarvadikṣu daśasvapi //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.221_0: yāvantaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā ye ca dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.222_0: na cātra budhyate kaścit siṃhanādaśca vartate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.223_0: pratītya dharmā vartante utpadyante pratītya ca /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.223_1: pratītyatāṃ yaddharmāṇāṃ sarve jānanti te viduḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.226_0: sa tāṃ gatiṃ gato bhoti yaḥ sarvāṃ gati jānati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.233_0: janetha gauravaṃ buddhe dharme saṃghe guṇottame /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.242_0: te ca sarve spharitvāna gandhavarṣaṃ pravarṣiṣuḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.242_1: ye ca ghrāyanti taṃ gandhaṃ te buddhā bhonti nāyakāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.244_0: ṛddhiṃ ca tatra sparśenti balabodhyaṅga indriyān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.248_0: pānīyaṃ te tataḥ pītvā puṣkariṇītaṭe sthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.248_1: sarve tṛṣṇāṃ vinoditvā bhonti lokasya cetiyāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.250_0: śṛṇvanti ye ca taṃ varṇaṃ te bhontī lokanāyakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.250_1: acintyā anuśaṃsā me iha sūtre prakāśitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.252_0: vaiḍūryasya ca daṇḍāni sphaṭikasya ca pañjarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.253_0: ye ca ghrāyanti taṃ gandhaṃ niścarantaṃ manoramam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.254_1: trīn doṣān kṣapayitvā ca bhonti buddhā sukhaṃdadāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.259_0: ratnāmayāśca te vṛkṣā iha kṣetrasmi nirmitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.261_0: na so 'sti keṣucid vyūhaḥ sarvakṣetreṣu sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.262_1: na te jñāne 'tra kāṅkṣati bodhisatvā mahāyaśāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.263_1: jñānena te vivardhante sāgaro vā sravantibhiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.264_0: na teṣāṃ labhyate 'nto hi pibato vā mahodagheḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.265_0: iha koṭayāṃ sthitāḥ śūrā bodhisattvā yaśasvinaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.267_0: na sa śīlaṃ vilumpeti api jīvitakāraṇāt /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.269_0: samāhitaḥ sa carati sajjate na samādhiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.274_0: na co apāyān gacchanti tasmāt kṣetrāttu te narāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.275_1: karotha mā tatra kāṅkṣāṃ gamiṣyatha sukhāvatīm //
S04bsu034_u:221_0: yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīnayutayabiṃbareṣu /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.277_0: yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīnayutayabiṃbareṣu /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.277_2: tāṃ pūja kṛtva puruṣavareṣu nityaṃ saṃkhyākalāpī na bhavati maitracittaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.278_0: śīlaṃ samādhiṃ satatu niṣevamāṇo dhyānān vimokṣāṃstathapi ca apramāṇān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.278_1: śūnyānimittān satatu niṣevamāṇo nacireṇa so hi sugatu bhavati loke //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.279_0: eṣā hi pūjā paramā viśiṣṭa mahyaṃ yaḥ śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvo /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.279_1: sada sarvabuddhāstena supūjitā hi kṣayāntakāle yaḥ sthitu bodhicitte //
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.280_0: suparīnditāste buddhasahasrakoṭyo ye bodhisattvā imu kṣayi kāli ghore /
S04bsu034_u:srs_32.280_1: rakṣanti dharmaṃ sugatavaropadiṣṭaṃ te mahya putrāścarimaka dharmapālāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:224_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule apramāṇe acintye aparimite yadāsīt /
S04bsu034_u:224_1: tena kālena tena samayena ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:224_2: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra ghoṣadattastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho aprameyānacintyānaparimāṇānasaṃkhyeyān sattvānāsravakṣayāyārhattve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃśca sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:224_3: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūcchrīghoṣo nāma /
S04bsu034_u:224_4: sa tasya tathāgatasya pūjārthaṃ tathāgatadhātugarbhāṇi caturaśītistūpakoṭisahasrāṇi kārayāmāsa /
S04bsu034_u:224_8: ihi hi kumāra sa rājā śrīghoṣastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā caturaśītyā bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇāṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ kārayitvā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānena pūjāyāmudyukto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:224_9: sarve ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan anācchedyapratibhānāḥ samādhipratilabdhāḥ asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhūtaguṇadharmadeśakāḥ pariśuddhadharmadeśakāḥ bodhisattvavaśipāramiprāptāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:224_10: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tatraiva parṣadi kṣemadatto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūcchiśurdaharaḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamayauvanasamanvāgate bhadrake vayasi vartamānaḥ avikrīḍitāvī kāmeṣu kaumārabrahmacārī ekavarṣa upasaṃpadā /
S04bsu034_u:224_11: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rāja śrīghoṣastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvamahāsattvagaṇamadhyeṣate sma yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃgītau /
S04bsu034_u:224_17: mahatī ca devamānuṣikā pariṣat saṃnipatitā dharmaśravaṇārthikā /
S04bsu034_u:224_18: adrākṣīt kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsatvastāni ca mahānti dīpārdhyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃprajvalitāni /
S04bsu034_u:224_20: sadevamānuṣikāṃ ca janatāṃ dharmaśravaṇāya saṃnipatitāṃ viditvā tasyaitadabhūt - ahamapi mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:224_22: yathārūpayā pūjayā sadevamānuṣāsuralokaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhaveddharmālokaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:224_23: imāṃ ca sarvāṃ tathāgatapūjāmabhibhaveyaṃ yeyaṃ śrīghoṣeṇa rājñā kṛtā /
S04bsu034_u:224_24: rājā ca śrīghoṣaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:225_0: atha khalu kṣemadatto bodhisattva evaṃcittaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyāṃ tathāgatacaityasya purataḥ sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ cīvarapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā tailaplutaṃ kṛtvā dīpayāmāsa /
S04bsu034_u:225_1: atha khalu kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣamāṇasya tathā pradīpte dakṣiṇe pāṇau nābhūt cittasya mukhavarṇasya vā anyathātvam /
S04bsu034_u:225_2: atha khalu kumāraḥ samanantarapradīpte kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāṇau saṃprajvalite saṃjyotībhūte ekajvālāprāpte,
S04bsu034_u:225_3: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu034_u:225_4: tasya pāṇau dīpyamānasya prabhayā tānyanekāni dīpārdhyakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhyāmīkṛtānyabhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:225_6: yenāvabhāsena sarvā diśo 'vabhāsitāḥ samantāt sphuṭā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:225_7: sa prītisaumanasyajāta imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ valgunā manorameṇa svareṇa viśiṣṭayā vācānuprabaddhaiḥ padavyañjanairvistareṇa sarvaparṣadaṃ vijñāpayan saṃprakāśayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:225_8: tatra dvādaśa sahasrāṇi trāyatriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devānāṃ saṃnipatitāni dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu034_u:225_11: adrākṣīdrājā śrīghoṣaḥ upariṣṭāt prāsādatalagataḥ svajanapuraskṛtaḥ antaḥpuramadhyagato 'ṣṭāṅgapoṣadhasamādattaḥ kṣemadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhunāvabhāsayantaṃ sarvāḥ prabhā abhibhūya divyayā atikrāntamānuṣikayāvabhāsitam /
S04bsu034_u:225_12: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhūt - abhijñāprāpto batāyaṃ kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu034_u:225_13: sa tīvraṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ ca cipasthāpya saparivāro mahākuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhopastabdhaḥ sārdhamaśītyāntaḥpurikābhistataḥ prāsādatalādātmānamutprākṣipat yadut kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya darśanāya prītisaṃmodanāya /
S04bsu034_u:225_14: sa gauravanirjātena kuśalamūlena dṛṣṭa eva dharme saparivāro devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaparigrahaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:225_16: punareva rājā śrīghoṣaḥ saparivāraḥ paripūrṇāddhastaśatasahasrikāt prāsādāt patitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:225_17: na cāsya kāyaviheṭhaścittaviheṭho vā avalīnatā vābhūt /
S04bsu034_u:226_1: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ ubhau bāhū pragṛhya mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamākrandraṃ cākārṣīt yaduta kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bāhuṃ dahyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃprajvalitam /
S04bsu034_u:226_2: sa rājā tena mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:227_0: atha khalu kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ rājānaṃ śrīghoṣamāmantrayate sma - kiṃ punasttvaṃ mahārāja anena mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamākrandaṃ kurvan rodiṣi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi? atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ kṣemadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ gāthābhigītena prābhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.3_0: yastvayā dīpito bāhuḥ prabhā muktā diśo daśa /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.4_0: prakampiteyaṃ pṛthivī cittaṃ te na ca līiyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.5_1: sārdhamantaḥpureṇeha na ca me kāyu hiṃsitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.6_1: sādhu vīryaṃ ca svārabdhaṃ sādhuṃ cādhyāśayo mahān //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.7_0: yasya hastau vidahyante na jātvastīha iñjanā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.8_0: pūrṇamāsyāṃ yathā candraḥ sūryo vāsau nabhastale /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.9_0: ahaṃ pi evaṃ praṇidhiṃ paripūreya paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.9_1: kāye premaṃ jahitvāhaṃ kuryāmarthaṃ ca prāṇinām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.10_1: yat puno aṅgahīno 'si tena me duḥkhamuttamam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.12_1: sa tu devāṅgahīnaḥ syāda yasya śīlaṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.15_0: astyeṣā laukikī pūjā anyā pūjā acintiyā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.15_1: ye dharmān śūnyān jānanti tyajante kāyajīvitam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.16_1: yā ceyaṃ janatā sarvā imāṃ gāthāṃ vijānatha //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.17_0: yena satyena buddho 'haṃ bheṣye lokasya cetiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.18_0: bhāṣitā va iyaṃ vācā dharaṇī ca prakampitā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.21_0: yena satyena dharmo 'sau bāhurnāma na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.21_1: tena satyena me bāhurbhoti kṣipraṃ yathā purā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.22_0: yena satyena dharmo 'sau kṣemadatto na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.23_0: yo 'pi niścarate śabdastaṃ pu śūnyaṃ vijānatha /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.24_1: tasya satyena vākyena sarvaloko na dahyate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.25_0: yāvantastribhave sattvā ye devā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.26_0: yāvantyupadravāḥ kecid ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_33.42_1: kāye prema na kurvīta iha dharme suśikṣitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:230_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena kuśalamūle pratiṣṭhite dharmadānena vā āmiṣadānena vā yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:230_1: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena taddānaṃ catusṛbhi pariṇāmanābhiḥ pariṇāmayitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:230_4: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pariṇāmaḥ / yebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitrebhyo 'ntikāttānyupāyakauśalyāni śṛṇuyāmudgṛhṇīyāṃ paryavāpnuyāṃ dhārayeyam,
S04bsu034_u:230_8: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ / ye bhogapratilābhāḥ sarvalokopajīvyā bhaveyustairme bhogapratilābhaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu034_u:230_10: ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ / ya ātmabhāvapratilābhaḥ dvābhyāmanugrahābhyāṃ sattvānanugṛhṇīyādāmiṣānugraheṇa ca dharmānugraheṇa ca,
S04bsu034_u:230_13: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pariṇāmaḥ / ābhiḥ kumāra catasṛbhiḥ pariṇāmanābhirbodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni /
S04bsu034_u:231_0: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā gṛhīṇā vā pravrajitena vā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ prajñāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sevitavyā bhajitavyāḥ paryupāsitavyā aśāṭhyena /
S04bsu034_u:231_4: adhyāśayasaṃpannena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣata kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmenāvikampamānena viśāradena svakaṃ māṃsaśoṇitamapi parityajya dharmabhāṇako bhikṣurābādhād vyutthāpayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule apramāṇe yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayenācintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'han samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:232_1: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra acintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yasminneva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhastatraiva divase parihate aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhanirmitān nirmāya aparimāṇānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ vinayaṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu034_u:232_2: [Vaidya_224] āsravakṣayāyārhattve pratiṣṭhāpya aparimāṇāṃśca sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve pratiṣṭhāpya tatraiva divase parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:232_3: tasya khalu punarbhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya caturaśītiḥ varṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi saddharmo 'tiṣṭhat /
S04bsu034_u:232_4: tasya ca bhagavato 'cintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājasya tathāgatasya śāsanāntardhānakālasamaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ bahavo bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūtā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_5: teṣāmevaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntā na rocante na cādhimucyante pratibādhante pratikṣipanti /
S04bsu034_u:232_6: īdṛśānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pīḍāṃ kurvanto yāvajjīvitād vyavaropaṇamakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_8: tena ca punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūd jñānabalo nāma jambudvīpeśvaraḥ saddharmaparigrāhakaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasaṃpannaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_9: tena khalu punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena iha jambudvīpe eko bhikṣurdharmabhāṇako 'bhūt tasya samādherdhārako bhūtamatirnāmnā tasya rājñaḥ kulapraveśakaḥ kalyāṇamitro hitaiṣī anukampakaḥ arthakāmaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_10: sa cāsya rājā atṛpto darśanenābhīkṣṇapratikāṅkṣī cābhūddarśanena dharmasaṃkathanopasaṃkramaṇaparyupāsanaparipṛcchāgrahaṇadhāraṇavācanavijñāpanasamarthaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_12: sattvānāmindriyabalavīryavimātratājñānadhātuvāsanākuśalaḥ satyasaṃdhikuśalaḥ visaṃdhiprativacanakuśalaḥ arthaviniścayakuśalaḥ gambhīrapratibhānaḥ sattvānāṃ vinayavidhijñaḥ pūrvābhilāpī smitamukhaḥ apagatabhrūkuṭimukho mahadgatacittavihārī mahākarūṇābhiyuktaḥ anabhibhūtaḥ sarvaparapravādibhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_13: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rājño jñānabalasya duhitā dārikābhūt ṣoḍaśavarṣā jātyā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā jñānāvatī nāma /
S04bsu034_u:232_14: tasyāḥ sa bhūtamatirbhikṣurācāryo 'bhūt kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:232_15: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya
S04bsu034_u:233_0: atha khalu rājā sāntapuraḥ saputraḥ saduhitṛparivāraḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayati sma sārdhamaśītyā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ paurairnāgaraiḥ sārdhaṃ rāṣṭreṇa naigamajānapadairgaṇakamahāmātraiḥ sārdhamamātyadauvārikapāriṣadyaiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:233_1: te sarve taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā prarodantaḥ aśraṇi pravartayāmāsuḥ - mā khalvayaṃ bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryāditi /
S04bsu034_u:233_2: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājño jñānabalasyānyatarā devatā purāṇasālohitābhūdanubaddhā /
S04bsu034_u:233_3: sā tasya rājñaḥ svapnāntargatasyāpadarśayati sma - sacet mahārāja etasya bhikṣornavakenāsaṃkliṣṭena mānuṣyeṇa rudhireṇaiṣa kṛṣṇavaisarpa ālipyeta,
S04bsu034_u:233_4: navakaṃ cāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ mānuṣaṃ māsaṃ nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ bhojanaṃ dīyeta,
S04bsu034_u:233_6: atha khalu rājā jñānabalastasyā rātryā atyayena tataḥ svapnāntarāt prativibuddho 'ntaḥpuramadhyagataḥ imāṃ svapnaprakṛtimantaḥpurāyārocayāmāsa - evaṃrūpaḥ svapno mayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:233_7: iti hi kumāra tataḥ stryāgārāttataśca rājakulānna kācit strī utsahate tasya [Vaidya_225] bhikṣostadbhaiṣajyaṃ dātum /
S04bsu034_u:233_9: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prativibuddhā antaḥpuramadhye imāmeva svapnaprakṛtiṃ mātṝṇāṃ parivārasya cārocayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:233_10: na ca kācidutsahate strī tasya bhikṣoretad bhaiṣajyaṃ dātum /
S04bsu034_u:234_0: atha khalu jñānavatī rājaduhitā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā evaṃ vyavasāyamakārṣīt - yannvahametad bhaiṣajyaṃ svakāccharīrād yathopadiṣṭaṃ navaṃ rudhiraṃ navaṃ ca māṃsaṃ dadyām /
S04bsu034_u:234_1: ahameveha rājakule sarvadaharā ca sarvataruṇī ca asaṃkliṣṭakāyavāṅbhanaskarmā ca /
S04bsu034_u:234_2: asaṃkliṣṭaṃ jñānameṣāmi asaṃkliṣṭasya dharmabhāṇakasya svaśarīrāda rudhiraṃ ca māṃsaṃ copanāmayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu034_u:234_4: atha khalu sā jñānavatī rājaduhitā svakamāvāsaṃ gatvā tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dharmāntargatena mānasena svakamūrumāṃsaṃ chittvā nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ praṇītamabhisaṃskṛtya lohitaṃ ca pragṛhya taṃ cācāryaṃ praveśya rājño jñānabalasya purato niṣadya lohitena taṃ visarpamālepayitvā tena ca svabhisaṃskṛtena bhojanena saṃtarpayati /
S04bsu034_u:234_5: atha khalu sa bhikṣurajānannaparibudhyamānaḥ apariśaṅkamānastadbhaktaṃ paribhuktavān /
S04bsu034_u:234_6: samanantaraparibhukte ca tasminnāhāre tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvāstā vedanā pratiprasrabdhāḥ,
S04bsu034_u:234_7: sarvaśca vyādhirapagataḥ / tena vigataparidāhena sarvasukhasamarpitena tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato 'ntaḥpurāttataśca nagarajanapadarāṣṭrasaṃnipātād dvādaśānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni /
S04bsu034_u:235_0: atha khalu rājā jñānabalaḥ svakāṃ duhitaraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.1_0: kutastvayā śoṇitu labdhu dārike kuto idaṃ āhṛtu māṃsa mānuṣam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.1_1: āhāru yaḥ sādhitu te 'dya dhīte yeno sukhīyaṃ kṛtu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.2_0: hato hyayaṃ vātha mṛto 'tha labdho yat sādhitaṃ nānarasehi vyañjanam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.2_1: kutaśca te śoṇitu labdhu dārike yeno ayaṃ mocitu vyādhi pāpakaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.3_0: pituḥ śruṇitvā vacanaṃ ca dārikā jñānāvatī tasya idaṃ bravīti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.3_1: alīnacittā ca giraṃ prabhāṣate śṛṇuṣva tātā yadahaṃ bravīmi te //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.5_1: yo dadyādasya bhikṣusya vyādhermucyet sa pāpakāt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.8_0: bhojanaṃ ca pradātavyaṃ śoṇitena ca lepanam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.9_0: yadi kriyā na kriyate kṣiprametena vyādhinā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.10_1: imaṃ dṛṣṭvā na ko vidvān kuryāt kāyasmi niśrayam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.11_0: antaḥpurasyo prativedayāmyahaṃ na eka nārīpi bhaṇāti dāsye /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.11_1: priyaśca me bhikṣuḥ priyaśca ātmā bodhyarthu tyaktaṃ maya māṃsaśoṇitam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.12_0: teṣāṃ na kāyesmi ca bhakti niśritā premāpi naivātmani cāṇumātram /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.12_1: tyaktvāpi cātmānu na bhoti durmanāḥ ye bodhi prārthenti śivāmaśokām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.13_0: antaḥpuraṃ tataḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ tadvismitaṃ abhūt /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.14_0: tato me nāmitaṃ cittaṃ bhikṣordāsyāmi bhojanam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.14_1: svāni māṃsānyahaṃ chittvā śoṇitena ca lepanam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.16_1: bhojanaṃ mānuṣaṃ māṃsaṃ śoṇitena ca lepanam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.17_0: śṛṇohi mahyaṃ vacanaṃ narādhipā manuṣyamāṃsasmi avidyamāne /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.17_2: chittvā svamāṃsāni mayoruto nṛpā sādhetva dattānima dharmabhāṇake //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.18_0: eṣo mayānuttarabodhi arthe svakātta kāyātta kṛto mahārthaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.18_1: bhikṣuśca muktaḥ kṛtu nirvikāro mayā ca puṇyaṃ kṛtamaprameyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.19_0: rājāpyavocadduhitāṃ kathaṃ te chidyanti kāyāttu svakāttu māṃse /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.19_1: bhaiṣajyayoge kriyamāṇi dārike mā te abhūd duḥkha śarīravedanā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.20_0: sa rājadhītā matimān viśāradā tamālapī rāja śṛṇu narādhipā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.20_1: śrutvā ca tatra pratipadya yoniśo acintiyaḥ karmavipāku tādṛśaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.21_0: pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena tātā niraye 'pi sattvā prapacanti dāruṇe /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.21_1: nirmāṃsa bhūtvā ca samāṃsa bhonti paśyetu karmāṇa phalaṃ acintiyam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.22_0: pāpena karmeṇa nirmāṃsaśoṇitāḥ kṣaṇena co bhonti samāṃsaśoṇitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.22_1: kiṃ vā punā tat kuśalena karmaṇā adhimuktito jāyati māṃsaśoṇitam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.23_0: chidyanti māṃse na mamāsi vedanā āhāri me śoṇitu nāsti iñjanā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.23_1: na dharmakāyasya vraṇo na chidraṃ yadi sarvu chidyeyu mama svamāṃsam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.24_0: prītiṃ mayā dharmi parāṃ janitvā chittvā pradattaṃ svakamūrumāṃsam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.24_1: na co mamā tāta vraṇena duḥkhaṃ jānāmi kāyo yathapūrvamāsīt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.25_0: audumbaraṃ puṣpu yathaiva tātā bahukalpakoṭīṣu kadāci dṛśyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.25_1: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇako kadāci dṛśyantiha jambudvīpe //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.26_0: yathaiva jāmbūnada niṣku bhāsate paśyanta sattvā na vitṛptimenti /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.26_1: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇakān dṛṣṭvā na tṛpyantiha devamānuṣāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.27_0: pītvā yathācchaṃ salilaṃ janasya tṛṣābhibhūtasya tṛṣā vigacchati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.27_1: emeva ete vidu dharmabhāṇakā dharmāmṛtaistṛṣṇa vinenti prāṇinām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.28_1: visarpu śāntaśca sa dharmabhāṇake kṛtaṃ mayā gauravu buddhavarṇitam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.29_1: yanme tu tyaktaṃ svakamātmamāṃsameteṣa dharmāṇa bhaveyya lābhinī //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.30_0: yathaiva gandhaḥ surabhī manoramaḥ kālānusārī śubha candanasya /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.30_1: pravāti gandho daśasu diśāsu emeva gandhopama dharmabhāṇakāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.31_1: avabhāsayanto diśatāsu rocate tathaiva merūpama dharmabhāṇakāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.32_0: yathaiva stūpaṃ patamānu kaścid vyutthāpayet saṃskari paṇḍito naraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.32_1: yastatra stūpe 'pi prasādu kuryād vyutthāpito yena sa tasya hetuḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.33_1: svakena māṃsena ca dharmagauravād dīpo mayā dīpitu jambudvīpe //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.34_0: eṣo 'kariṣyad yadi bhikṣu kālaṃ samādhiśabdo 'piha jambudvīpe /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.34_1: niruddhu sattvāna sadābhaviṣyat cikitsite 'smin sa samādhi labdhaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.35_0: sarvasya lokasya paritrāṇu bhikṣurandhasya lokasya ca cakṣudāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.35_1: rāgasya doṣasya mohasya caiva cikitsako 'yaṃ mama vaidyarājaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.36_0: mahadgate citti sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇu caryāya na tasya labhyate /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.37_0: na mahya bhūyo vinipātato bhayaṃ strītvaṃ punarme na ca bhūyu bheṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.37_1: sahasrakalpāna ca koṭiyo bhuyo kṛtvā paraṃ gauravu dharmabhāṇake //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.38_0: yo buddhakṣetrān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ ratanāna pūrṇān dadi nāyakānām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.38_1: yaścaiva pādāṅgulimeka dadyādidaṃ tataḥ puṇyu viśiṣyate param //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.39_0: sā dārikā kālamitaśca kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.39_1: sarveṣa co śāsani pravrajitvā imaṃ varaṃ śāntu samādhi deśayī //
S04bsu034_u:236_0: sarveṣa teṣāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ caramismi kāle /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.40_0: sarveṣa teṣāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ caramismi kāle /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.41_0: dīpaprabhasyātha tathāgatasya caritva sā śāsani brahmacaryam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.41_1: strībhāvu tasmin vinivartayitvā abhūṣi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.42_0: maitreya jñānaṃbalu so narendraḥ saddharmaparigrāhaku nityakālam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.42_1: dīpaṃkaro 'sau abhūddharmabhāṇako ahaṃ ca āsaṃ tada rājadhītā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.43_0: svakena māṃsena ca śoṇitena co upasthito me tada dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.43_1: śāṭhyaṃ ca sarvaṃ parivarjayitvā imaṃ samādhiṃ pratikāṅkṣatā tadā //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.44_0: yebhī tadā roditu bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā gilānakaṃ pīḍitu vedanābhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.44_1: avivartikāste sada sarvi bhūvan na jātu yātā vinipātabhūmim //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.45_0: nābhūṣi teṣāṃ sada akṣirogo na śīrṣarogo na ca karṇarogaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.45_1: na ghrāṇarogo na ca jihvarogo na ca dantaśūlaṃ na kadācidāsīt //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.46_0: samantaprāsādiku bhonti nityaṃ śirīya tejena jvalantakāyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.47_0: mahyaṃ ca te śāsani pravrajitvā pralujyamānānimu buddhabodhim /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.47_1: dhāritva te gañju tathāgatānāṃ drakṣyanti buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyo //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.48_0: susaṃgṛhītvānima buddhabodhiṃ dhāretva nityaṃ ca hi gauraveṇa /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.48_1: te arthu kṛtvā vipulaṃ prajānāṃ drakṣyanti akṣobhya narāṇamuttamam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.49_0: śrutvā ca te carya niruttarāmimāṃ lapsyanti prītiṃ cariyāṃ nirāmiṣām /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.49_1: śrutvā ca te ātmana pūrvacaryāṃ kāhinti buddhāna udārapūjām //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.50_0: dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn vidu śīlavanto niḥśāṭhiyeno sada sevitavyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.50_1: akhilaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca vivarjayitvā seveta bhikṣuṃ tada dharmabhāṇakāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.51_0: āghātu krodhaṃ ca vivarjayitvā pūjetha putrān mama dharmaśāsane /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.51_1: mā andhabhūtā bahukalpakoṭiyo vinipātaprāptāśca bhaveta duḥkhitāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.52_0: na śīlu trāyeta śrataṃ ca tasya na dhyānu trāyenna araṇyavāsaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_34.52_1: tadā nu trāyenna ca buddhapūjā vyāpādu kṛtvāna paraspareṇa //
S04bsu034_u:239_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt praṣṭavyapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
S04bsu034_u:239_1: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - tena hyānanda svake āsane niṣadya pṛccha tvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi,
S04bsu034_u:239_2: ahaṃ te tasya tasya praśnasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye /
S04bsu034_u:239_5: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ purataḥ āsane niṣadya bhagavantametadavocat - ko nu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadiha ekatyā bodhisattvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā hastacchedān pādacchedān karṇacchedānakṣyutpāṭanāni aṅgottamāṅgacchedān nigacchanti pratyaṅgacchedāṃśca? vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? no ca hīyante?na ca parikṣīyante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - sacet tvamānanda jānīyā yāni me duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samudānayitum,
S04bsu034_u:239_6: etadapi te ca pratibhāyāt / kiṃ punaryattathāgataṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyathāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:239_7: tad yathāpi nāma ānanda iha kāścideva puruṣaḥ adhastāt pādatalamupādāya yāvanmūrdhakādādīpto bhavet prajvalitaḥ ekajvālībhūtaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:239_8: taṃ kaścideva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vadet - ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti /
S04bsu034_u:239_9: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣaḥ anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍeta rameta paricārayeta? ānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S04bsu034_u:239_10: bhagavānāha - krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo rameta paricārayeta parikalpamupādāyānirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:239_11: na tveva tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇasya sattvāṃstribhirupāyairduḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrānnābhūt sukhaṃ
S04bsu034_u:239_13: ye ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā akhaṇḍaśīlā bhavanti achidraśīlāḥ akalmāṣaśīlā aśabalaśīlāḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlāḥ acalitaśīlāḥ,
S04bsu034_u:239_14: alulitaśīlā akopyaśīlāḥ, nottānaśīlāḥ,na paradarśanaśīlāḥ na visaṃvādaśīlāḥ,
S04bsu034_u:239_17: te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anantāṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā na hastacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /
S04bsu034_u:240_1: tena kālena tena samayena ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu034_u:240_2: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya navatikalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu034_u:240_3: sarvatra ca divase navatikalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi sattvānāmavaivartikatāyāṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:240_4: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya caramikāyāṃ pañcāśati saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntā bahujanajugupsitā bahujanavivarjitā bahujanaviruddhā mahājanotsṛṣṭāścābhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:240_5: mahābhayabhairavakāle vartamāne mahopadrave ativṛṣṭikālasamaye anāvṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne vyālakālasamaye vartamāne vidyutkāntārakalpasamaye durbhikṣakālasamaye mithyādṛṣṭikālasamaye asamyagdṛṣṭikālasamaye tīrthikamantraparyeṣṭikālasamaye buddhabodheḥ pralujyamānakālasamaye vartamāne sapta bodhisattvasahasrāṇi grāmanagaranigamarā rājadhānījanapadebhyo nirvāsitāni samantabhadraṃ nāma vanakhaṇḍaṃ tadupaniśritya viharanti sma sārdhaṃ supuṣpacandreṇa dharmabhāṇakena,
S04bsu034_u:240_7: sa khalu punā rājā supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇaka eko rahogataḥ pratisaṃlīno divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣeṇa paśyati sma - bahvīrbodhisattvakoṭiravaruptakuśalamūlā anyonyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ ihopapannāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:240_12: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya yenāsau mahān bodhisattvagaṇastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇametadavocat
S04bsu034_u:240_14: atha khalu sa mahān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ supuṣpacandraṃ dharmabhāṇakametadavocat - nāsmākamabhipretaṃ yadāyuṣmānito vanaṣaṇḍād grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīravataret /
S04bsu034_u:240_18: āyuṣmāṃścātīva prāsādiko 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prathamayauvanasamanvāgato bhadrake vayasi vartate /
S04bsu034_u:240_19: sa dhautakāñcanahāṭakacchaviḥ [Vaidya_234] śaṅkhakundenduvarṇayorṇayā pratimaṇḍito 'pi śobhitalalāṭo nīlakuñcitakeśoṇīṣaśca /
S04bsu034_u:240_20: mā te rājaputrā vā anye vā tatpratimā īrṣyāmātsaryopahacetaso jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyanti /
S04bsu034_u:240_21: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakastaṃ bodhisattvagaṇametadavocat - sacenme ātmā ārakṣyo bhavet,
S04bsu034_u:240_22: na mayā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane ārakṣā kṛtā bhavet /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.1_0: na ātmasaṃjñāya vasitva jātu śakyaṃ ihā śāsani rakṣa kurvaṇā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.1_1: mahāvitānā sugatāna bodhiḥ prakāśanā paścimi kāli dāruṇe //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.2_0: yo ātmasaṃjñā prajahitva sarvaśaḥ sattvānimān pudgalavādaniśritān /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.2_1: rūpāṇi śabdāṃśca rasāṃśca gandhān spraṣṭavyu varjeti sa rakṣi śāsanam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.3_1: chatraiḥ patākābhi dīpakriyābhiḥ kalpāna koṭī yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.4_0: yaścaiva saddharma pralujyamāne nirudhyamāne sugatāna śāsane /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.4_1: rātriṃdivaṃ eka careyya śiṣyān idaṃ tataḥ puṇyu viśiṣṭu bhoti //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.5_0: ye dāni teṣāṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ saddharmi lujyanti upekṣi bhāvayī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.5_1: na tairjinā satkṛta bhonti kecit na co kṛtaṃ gauravu nāyakeṣu //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.5_2: yuṣme bhotha sukhī svakārthu kuruthā gopāyathā
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.5_3: ātmanaṃ yuṣme bhotha ihāpramatta vinaye maitrīvihārī sadā /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.5_4: śīlaṃ rakṣatha ujjvalaṃ aśabalaṃ śuddhaṃ śuci nirmalaṃ
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.5_5: yehī rakṣitu śīlu bhoti amalaṃ buddhebhi saṃvarṇitam //
S04bsu034_u:241_1: yehī satkṛtu bhonti sarvi sugatā yāvanta pūrve abhūt
S04bsu034_u:241_2: tehi trāyitu bhonti sarvajanatā yā bodhisaṃprasthitā /
S04bsu034_u:241_3: tehī uddharitāḥ bhavanti narakā sattvā bahū pāpakāḥ
S04bsu034_u:241_4: yehī rakṣitu bhonti śīlu amalaṃ buddhaiḥ praśastaṃ purā //
S04bsu034_u:242_0: dānaṃ detha viśiṣṭa dharmaratanaṃ kṣāntiṃ sadā rakṣathāraṇyaṃ cāśrayathā samādhikuśalā bhāvetha co mārdavam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_0: dānaṃ detha viśiṣṭa dharmaratanaṃ kṣāntiṃ sadā rakṣathāraṇyaṃ cāśrayathā samādhikuśalā bhāvetha co mārdavam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_1: mā co vigraha sarvathā vicarathā śiṣṭāṃ śivāṃ cārikāṃ
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_2: gacchāmo vayu rājadhāni nagaraṃ sattvāna trāṇārthikāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_4: vartentī imi aśrukāḥ sukaruṇaṃ pādehi anye patī /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_5: mā hī otarahī mahāmati vidu prekṣa vane pādapān
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_7: te 'pī pūrva vināyakā daśabalāḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_9: śreṣṭhāṃ cārika bodhihetu caritāste puṇyajñānāṃ varāḥ
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_10: teṣāṃ śikṣihi kānane nivasato mā gaccha tvaṃ suvrata //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_11: gātraṃ citritu lakṣaṇaiḥ suruciraiḥ keśāśca nīlāstavā
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.8_14: mā te īrṣyu janitva kāyu vikirī rājānurāje tathā //
S04bsu034_u:243_0: atha khalvānanda supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakastaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ gāthayābhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:243_1: yāvantaḥ parimeṇa āsi sugatāḥ sarvajña kṣīṇāsravāḥ
S04bsu034_u:243_2: sarve te 'tha kariṃsu loki tribhave bodhādhigamyāṃ varām /
S04bsu034_u:243_3: śreṣṭhāṃ cārika bodhihetu caritāste puṇyajñānāṃ varāḥ
S04bsu034_u:243_4: teṣāṃ śikṣaya bodhisatva niyutā sattvāna trāṇārthikaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:243_5: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ ṛṣividuṃ pādāni vanditvanā
S04bsu034_u:243_6: ghoraṃ āśvasato svananti karuṇaṃ krandanta ārtasvaram /
S04bsu034_u:243_7: anye chinna prapāta medini patī mūrcchitva sālo yathā
S04bsu034_u:243_8: no cā te parivarti puṇyanicitaḥ sattvārthakāmo ṛṣiḥ //
S04bsu034_u:244_0: pātraṃ cīvaru gṛhya prasthitu ṛṣī siṃho yathā kesarī
S04bsu034_u:244_1: no cāsyo guṇadoṣa tatra akarī dharmasvabhāve sthitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.14_0: ghane kānani asmi loki vasataḥ sattvā apāye pati
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.14_1: so 'bhūttaṃ nagaraṃ gamī puravaraṃ sattvānaṃ trāṇārthikaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:245_0: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭarājadhānīravataritvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_1: tena pūrvāhṇe avataritvā sattvānāṃ navanavati prāṇikoṭyaḥ avaivartiṃkatāyāṃ sthāpitāḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau /
S04bsu034_u:245_4: sa tasyāḥ ratnāvatyāḥ rājadhānyāmupasaḥkramitvā anyatarasmin plakṣasālamūle vyahārṣīt /
S04bsu034_u:245_5: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena tāḥ ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ prāviśat /
S04bsu034_u:245_8: sa bhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya āsthitaka eva rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_9: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena dvitīye prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya trayoviḥśatiprāṇikoṭīravaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_11: sa dvitīyabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya utthitaka eva rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_12: sa tasyāḥ rātryāmatītāyāḥ trirātrabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya navanavatiprāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_14: sa trirātrabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya utthitaka eva tṛtīyaḥ rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_15: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena caturthe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya navanavatiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati /
S04bsu034_u:245_16: sa caturdivasabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya utthitaka eva rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_17: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena pañcame divase ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya rājño 'ntaḥpuraḥ prāviśat /
S04bsu034_u:245_18: pravisya cāśītiḥ strīsahasrāṇyavaivartikatve 'nuttarāyāḥ samaksaḥbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_20: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena ṣaṣṭhe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśya sahasraḥ
S04bsu034_u:245_22: na ca tāvad bhaktasya kṛtyaḥ karoti sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_23: sa ṣaṣṭhe bhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaḥkramya rātriḥdivamatināmayati sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_24: sa tasya rātryā atyayena saptame purobhakte ratnāvatīḥ rājadhānīḥ praviśyādrākṣīcchūradattaḥ rājānamudyānamabhiniṣkramantaḥ suvarṇamayena rathena rūpyamayaiḥ pakṣabhiruragasāracandanamayyā īṣayā vaidūryamayaiścakraiḥ ucchritacchatradhvajasamalaḥkṛtena īṣāpaṭṭāvanaddhena dūṣyapaṭṭasaḥchāditena [Vaidya_237] yatrāṣṭau śatāni kumārīṇāḥ ratnasūtraparigṛhītānām,
S04bsu034_u:245_25: yāstaḥ rathaḥ vāhayanti abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhravarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāḥ pritikārye audvilyakārye bālānāḥ na piṇḍatānām /
S04bsu034_u:245_28: pañca ca duhitṛśatāni ratnamayīśibikābhirūḍhāḥ purato niryānti sma /
S04bsu034_u:245_29: tāḥ sahadarśanenaiva tasya bhikṣoravaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaḥbodhau /
S04bsu034_u:245_31: sa ca mahājanakāyo maṇikuṇḍalānyapanīya pādukāścāpanīya ekāḥsaḥ cīvaraḥ prāvṛtya dakḥiṇaḥ jānumaṇḍalaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pratiḥṭhāpya yena sa bhikḥustenāñjaliḥ praṇamya namasyamānaḥ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:245_32: atha khalu tā api kumārthaḥ pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saḥcoditāḥ samānāstābhyaḥ śibikābhyo 'vataritvā ekāḥsaḥ cīvaraḥ prāvṛtya dakḥiṇaḥ jānumaṇḍalaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pratiḥṭhāpya yena sa bhi stenāñjāla praṇamya gāthābhiradhyabhāḥanta -
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.16_1: krodho doṣaśca īrṣyā ca sarvaṃ chinnaṃ tadantaram //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.19_1: puṣpitaḥ sālarājo vā emeva bhikṣu śobhate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.20_1: sumerumūrdhni tridaśāna īśvaro emeva bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate 'yam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.21_0: brahmeva manye pratiṣṭhitu brahmaloke sunirmito vādhipati devaputraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.21_1: suyāmu devo yathariva kāmadhātau emeva bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate 'yam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.22_0: sūryo vā manye pratapati antarīkṣe sahasraraśmirvidhamiya andhakāram /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.22_1: obhāsayanto samu diśatā samantād emeva bhikṣuḥ praviśatu śobhate 'yam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.23_0: dānaṃ daditvā suvipula nantakalpān rakṣitva śīlaṃ aśabalu nityakālam /
S04bsu034_u:srs_35.23_1: bhāvetva kṣāntimasadṛśa sarvaloke so lakṣaṇebhiḥ parivṛtu eva śobhī //

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.21_0: buddhāna kṣetrā yatha gaṅgavālikā ye teṣa sattvā gati teṣūpapannāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.21_1: gaṇetu te śakyamathāpi cintituṃ na teṣa sūtrāṇa ya nityu bhāṣate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.22_0: gaṇetu śakyamita kalpakoṭibhiḥ mahāsamudreṣviha yātti vālikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.22_1: nadīṣu kuṇḍeṣu hradeṣu tadvad ananta sūtrānta sa yat prabhāṣate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.23_0: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭiṣu ya āpaskandhaḥ sada tatra tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.23_1: śatāya bhinnāya vālāgrakoṭiyo svarāṅga teṣāṃ na tu śakyu sarvaśaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.24_0: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭibhirye sattva āsan purimeṇa tatra /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.24_1: ya ātmabhāve vinibaddhasārā na teṣa sūtrāntanirhāra jānitum //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.25_0: gaṇetu śakyaṃ ruta sarvaprāṇināṃ ye santi sattvā daśasu diśāsu /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.25_1: na śakyu sūtrānta gaṇetu tasya yad bhāṣate 'sau satatamaviṣṭhitaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.26_1: viniścaye bhūtanayeṣu śikṣito viśālabuddhiḥ sada harṣaprajñaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.27_1: ghoṣasvabhāvaṃ pṛthu sarva jānatī śabdāṃśca tān nirdiśato na sajjati //

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.29_0: ekasya sūtrasyupadeśakoṭiyo acintiyāṃ niordiśato na sajjati /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.29_2: asaṅganirdeśapadārthakovido bhāṣantu so parṣagato na sajjate //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.30_0: yaḥ susthito bhoti iho samādhiye sa bodhisattvo bhavatī akampiyaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.31_1: tathaiva bhikṣurvidu dharmabhāṇakaṃ kampetu śakyaṃ na parapravādibhiḥ //

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.36_0: balāni bodhyaṅga na tasya durlabhā pratisaṃvido ṛddhividhī acintiyā /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.37_0: bhavābhivṛttasya na tasya durlabhaṃ anantajñānena jināna darśanam /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.38_0: sarveṣa co teṣa jināna antike sa śroṣyate etu samādhi śāntam /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.39_0: saced bhavenmaṇiratanāna pūrṇā mahāsahasrā iya lokadhātuḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.40_0: yāvanta kṣetrā bahuvidha te anantā jāmbūnadāsaṃstṛta pūrṇa sarve /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.41_0: yāvanti santi bahu vividhā hi sattvā dānaṃ dadeyurvividhamanantakalpān /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.44_0: yaśco samādhimimu varu śreṣṭha gṛhṇeccatuṣpadāṃ gātha sa tuṣṭacittaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.46_0: yaśco labhitvā imu vara śāntabhūmiṃ śrutasya gotraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.46_1: puryāpuṇeyyā pramuditu bodhisattvaḥ sa śīghrametaṃ pratilabhi buddhajñānam //
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.47_0: yo 'pī nidhānaṃ pratilabhi evarūpaṃ kṣetrānanantān yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_36.47_1: te co bhaveyurmaṇiratanāna pūrṇā divyāna co tathapi ca mānuṣāṇām //

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.48_1: yo bodhisattvo labhati imaṃ samādhiṃ paryāpuṇantaḥ satatamatṛptu bhoti //

S04bsu034_u:267_1: te te dānapatī bhavanti satataṃ sada muktatyāgī vidu

S04bsu034_u:267_18: dṛṣṭvā caiva pranaṣṭa utpathagatān saṃsāramārge sthitān /

S04bsu034_u:267_24: tīre pārami kṣema nityamabhaye sthāpenti sattvān sadā //

S04bsu034_u:268_2: dṛṣṭvā sattva pramūḍha mārgaratane sada mārapāśe sthitāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_36.68_0: ṛddhipāramiprāpta bhonti satataṃ gacchanti kṣetrān śatān

S04bsu034_u:271_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemāṃścāparimāṇānāścaryādbhutān bodhisattvadharmānākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmenāyaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo 'raṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:271_3: dharmārthikena ca bhavitavyaṃ dharmakāmena dharmapratigrāhakena dharmānudharmapratipannena /

S04bsu034_u:272_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tamevārthamudyotayamāna imameva pūrvayogakathānirdeśaṃ gāthābhigītena saṃprakāśayati sma -

S04bsu034_u:282_0: punaraparaṃ kumāra yena kāyasaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati /

S04bsu034_u:283_1: tena kālena tena samayena jñānaprabhāso nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka [Vaidya_280] udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.8_0: arthe prayuktāna mayārthu deśito ye arthanetrīparatā vicakṣaṇāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.21_0: jālena pāśena ca śakyu bandhituṃ caturdiśaṃ vāyati vātamaṇḍalī /

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.29_0: bhayairvimuktasya na trāsu jāyate asaṃtrasantasya na bhoti iñjanā /

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.32_1: sa śikṣitu īdṛśuḥ kāyasaṃvare bhaviṣyate cetiyu sarvaloke //

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.33_1: sa śikṣitu īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare yaḥ śikṣitastasya balā na durlabhāḥ //
S04bsu034_u:srs_38.34_0: ye cāpi aṣṭādaśa buddhadharmā āveṇikā yeṣu jinā pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_38.34_1: te cāpi tasyo na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare //

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.40_0: śrutvā iho īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare viśeṣaprāpto abhu rājaputraḥ /

S04bsu034_u:srs_38.44_1: ārye ca śīle sa anāsrave sthitaḥ / prajānamāno imu kāyasaṃvaram //

S04bsu034_u:310_7: / tatra - - - - abhijñāsākṣātkriyā? yadidaṃ caturṇāmṛddhipādānāṃ pratilambhaḥ ṛddhivikurvaṇatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_9: / tatra - - - - vāsanānusaṃghisamuddhātajñānam? yadida pūrvabālacarivijugupsanatā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyaspṛhaṇatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_20: / tatra - - - - śrutaparyeṣṭiḥ? yadidaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapiṭakasya bodhisattvapiṭakasya ca ādhāraṇatā bhāvanatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_25: / - - - - śailopamatā? yadidaṃ bodhicittasyānutsargaḥ? - - - - akampanatā? yadidaṃ kleśairasaṃhāryatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_31: / - - - - kleśānāmasamudācāraḥ? yadidaṃ avidyāyā bhavatṛṣṇāyāśca krodhasya cānutpādanatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_32: / - - - - śikṣāyā aparityāgaḥ? yadidaṃ karmavipākapattīyanatā buddhagauravatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_33: / - - - - samādhivyavasthānam? yadidaṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāvyayakauśalyaṃ cittaikāgratā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_45: / - - - - karmavipākapattiyanatā? yadidaṃ lajjayā pāpakāt karmaṇo viratiḥ,
S04bsu034_u:310_51: / - - - - kṣāntisamādānam? yadidaṃ parato duruktānāṃ vacanapathānāmadhyupekṣā kṣāntyakhaṇḍanatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_66: / - - - - indriyaprāsādikatā? yadidaṃ dharmagatamanasikāratā yuktabhāṇitā kālajñatā yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhūtaprakāśanatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_72: /....hriyāpaṇata // yadidaṃ anabhimukhatā //.... akuśalacittajugupsanatā? yadidaṃ bāladharmabudhyanatā taiścāsamavadhānam /
S04bsu034_u:310_77: anālasyatā cā //.... mānasya nigrahaḥ? yadidaṃ ātmano 'nupalabdhiranālambanatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_91: /.... asatpuruṣavarjanatā? yadidaṃ upalambhikānāṃ kusīdānāṃ ca vivarjanatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_93: dhyānānāmanutsarjanatā, prītyavijahatā ca //.... dhyāneṣvanadhyavasānam? yadidaṃ traidhātukasamatikramaṇacchandaḥ satvaparipācanācchandaḥ uttariprajñāvabhāsacchandaśca /
S04bsu034_u:310_94: /....abhijñāvikurvaṇatā? yadidaṃ pañcasvabhijñāsu sthitvā durvijñeyānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_100: /.... lābhasatkārānādeyatā? yadidaṃ anutkaṇṭhatā ca viagatapāpecchatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_102: /.... bhūtānāṃ varṇānāmanadhivāsanatā? yadidaṃ praticchannakalyāṇatā ca lābhasatkārasya cāntarāyabudhyanatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_109: / .... pravrajitaiḥ sārdhamasaṃstavaḥ? yadidaṃ ayuktavivarjanatā ca yuktaparyeṣaṇatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_119: /.... pratyarthikanigrahaḥ? yadidaṃ yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prakāśanatā vyavasthāpanatā ca,
S04bsu034_u:310_125: /.... duḥśīlānāmanukampanā? yadidaṃ pareṣāmāpatteruddharaṇatā ca śīlapratiṣṭhāpanatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_130: pareṣāṃ cāmiṣānugrahaḥ //.... asaṃnicayasthānam? yadidaṃ āmiṣajugupsanatā ārakṣādoṣadarśanatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_141: /....kuśalamūlapūrvaṃgamatā? yadidaṃ bodhau tīvracchandatā ca pareṣāṃ samutsāhanatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_142: / .... upāyakauśalyam? yadidaṃ pratideśanānumodanādhyeṣaṇā kuśalānāṃ ca pariṇāmanākauśalyam /
S04bsu034_u:310_143: / ....nimittaprahāṇam? yadidaṃ svapnopamānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ budhyanatā ca vastuvibhāvanatā
S04bsu034_u:310_146: /.... sūtrāntābhinirhārakauśalyam? yadidaṃ yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ upamāvadānaiḥ saṃprakāśanatā /
S04bsu034_u:310_174: /.... yogācārabhūmiḥ? yadidaṃ saptatriśatāṃ bodhipakṣikāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanā /
S04bsu034_u:310_179: mokṣaḥ //.... buddhabhūmiḥ? yadidaṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilābhitā /
S04bsu034_u:310_184: /.... bodhisattvaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ? yadidaṃ durlabhatā ca mahābhaiṣajyatā ca /
S04bsu034_u:310_190: /....kinnaraiḥ stavanīyam? yadidaṃ sarvamokṣaprāmodyāharaṇatāmupādāya? mahoragaiḥ praśaṃsanīyam? yadidaṃ saṃsārocchedanatāmupādāya /
S04bsu034_u:310_193: /....dhanamanuttaram? yadidaṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ saṃpatterāhātitrakaṃ copādāya mokṣāhāritrakamupādāya /
S04bsu034_u:310_198: /.... vigamaḥ śokasya? yadidaṃ nirarthakaḥ vyādhiduḥkhabudhyanāvataraṇatāmupādāya nairātmyaduḥkhaprajānanatāmupādāya /
S04bsu034_u:310_213: /.... asaṃhāryatā sarvajñānasya? yadidaṃ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya ca saṃvartate sarvakuśaladharmāhāraṇatāyai ca sarvasattvamokṣāharaṇatāyai saṃvartate /
S04bsu034_u:310_218: /.... paritrāṇamamitramadhyagatānām? yadidaṃ sarvopalambhikānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭikānāṃ parājayatāyai saṃvartate /
S04bsu034_u:310_219: / ....sahadharmeṇa tīrthikānāṃ nigrahaḥ? yadidaṃ sahadharmeṇa tīrthikānāṃ nigrahamupādāya /
S04bsu034_u:310_240: /.... abhijñā vikurvitukāmānām? yadidaṃ anāvaraṇatāmupādāya kāmanīyadharmatāṃ copādāya /
S04bsu034_u:310_259: iti sarvadharmānutpādyatāmupādāya? ayameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ padaśatānāṃ nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:310_260: ayaṃ sa ucyate kumāra sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcito nāma samādhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:313_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:srs_40.1_0: vipulā buddhadharmā hi vipulo deśito nayaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:srs_40.3_0: vipulā cari sattvānāṃ vipulā teṣu deśitā /
S04bsu034_u:314_0: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhinirdeśe dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe aprameyaiḥ sattvairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni,
S04bsu034_u:314_4: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍavikāraṃ kampitaḥ prakampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:314_6: vedhitaḥ pravedhitaḥ / saṃpravedhitaḥ / kṣumitaḥ prakṣubhitaḥ saṃprakṣubhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:315_0: sulabdhā lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ya imaṃ mahākaruṇāvatāradharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu034_u:315_1: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitasamādhiṃ punaḥ punaḥ śroṣyanti,
S04bsu034_u:315_2: śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayiṣyanti,
S04bsu034_u:316_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhvīṣva tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi,
S04bsu034_u:316_2: atha khalvāyuṣmānānado bhagavantametadavocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:316_3: kathaṃ caina dhārayāmi? bhagavānāha - mahākaruṇāvatāro nāmānanda idaṃ sūtraṃ dhāraya /
S04bsu034_u:316_5: ānanda āha - udgṛhīto me bhagavannayaṃ dharmaparyāya iti /
S04bsu034_u:317_1: āttamanāścandraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ tāścatasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ aneke ca śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
S04bsu034_u:318_0: ityāryasarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitāt samādheryathālabdhaṃ samādhirājaṃ nāma mahāyānasūtraṃ parivarto nāma catvāriṃśatitamaṃ samāptam /
S04bsu034_u:319_1: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu034_u:319_2: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
